168 struct act_item {

177  : loc( loc ),
178  count( count ),
179  consumed_moves( consumed_moves ) {}

186 static bool same_type( const std::list<item> &items )
187 {
188  return std::all_of( items.begin(), items.end(), [&items]( const item & it ) {
189  return it.type == items.begin()->type;
190  } );
191 }

193 // Deprecated. See `contents_change_handler` and `Character::handle_contents_changed`
194 // for contents handling with item_location.
195 static bool handle_spillable_contents( Character &c, item &it, map &m )
196 {
197  if( it.is_bucket_nonempty() ) {
198  it.spill_open_pockets( c, /*avoid=*/&it );
199 
200  // If bucket is still not empty then player opted not to handle the
201  // rest of the contents
202  if( !it.empty() ) {
203  c.add_msg_player_or_npc(
204  _( "To avoid spilling its contents, you set your %1$s on the %2$s." ),
205  _( "To avoid spilling its contents, <npcname> sets their %1$s on the %2$s." ),
206  it.display_name(), m.name( c.pos() )
207  );
208  m.add_item_or_charges( c.pos(), it );
209  return true;
210  }
211  }
212 
213  return false;
214 }

216 static void put_into_vehicle( Character &c, item_drop_reason reason, const std::list<item> &items,
217  const vpart_reference &vpr )
218 {
219  if( items.empty() ) {
220  return;
221  }
222  c.invalidate_weight_carried_cache();
223  vehicle_part &vp = vpr.part();
224  vehicle &veh = vpr.vehicle();
225  const tripoint where = veh.global_part_pos3( vp );
226  map &here = get_map();
227  int items_did_not_fit_count = 0;
228  int into_vehicle_count = 0;
229  const std::string part_name = vp.info().name();
230 
231  // can't use constant reference here because of the spill_contents()
232  for( item it : items ) {
233  if( handle_spillable_contents( c, it, here ) ) {
234  continue;
235  }
236 
237  if( it.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
238  here.add_item_or_charges( c.pos(), it );
239  it.charges = 0;
240  }
241 
242  if( veh.add_item( vp, it ) ) {
243  into_vehicle_count += it.count();
244  } else {
245  if( it.count_by_charges() ) {
246  // Maybe we can add a few charges in the trunk and the rest on the ground.
247  const int charges_added = veh.add_charges( vp, it );
248  it.mod_charges( -charges_added );
249  into_vehicle_count += charges_added;
250  }
251  items_did_not_fit_count += it.count();
252  //~ %1$s is item name, %2$s is vehicle name, %3$s is vehicle part name
253  add_msg( m_mixed, _( "Unable to fit %1$s in the %2$s's %3$s." ), it.tname(), veh.name, part_name );
254  // Retain item in inventory if overflow not too large/heavy or wield if possible otherwise drop on the ground
255  if( c.can_pickVolume( it ) && c.can_pickWeight( it, !get_option<bool>( "DANGEROUS_PICKUPS" ) ) ) {
256  c.i_add( it );
257  } else if( !c.has_wield_conflicts( it ) && c.can_wield( it ).success() ) {
258  c.wield( it );
259  } else {
260  const std::string ter_name = here.name( where );
261  add_msg( _( "The %s falls to the %s." ), it.tname(), ter_name );
262  here.add_item_or_charges( where, it );
263  }
264  }
265  it.handle_pickup_ownership( c );
266  }
267 
268  if( same_type( items ) ) {
269  const item &it = items.front();
270  const int dropcount = items.size() * it.count();
271  const std::string it_name = it.tname( dropcount );
272 
273  switch( reason ) {
274  case item_drop_reason::deliberate:
275  if( items_did_not_fit_count == 0 ) {
276  c.add_msg_player_or_npc(
277  n_gettext( "You put your %1$s in the %2$s's %3$s.",
278  "You put your %1$s in the %2$s's %3$s.", dropcount ),
279  n_gettext( "<npcname> puts their %1$s in the %2$s's %3$s.",
280  "<npcname> puts their %1$s in the %2$s's %3$s.", dropcount ),
281  it_name, veh.name, part_name
282  );
283  } else if( into_vehicle_count > 0 ) {
284  c.add_msg_player_or_npc(
285  n_gettext( "You put some of your %1$s in the %2$s's %3$s.",
286  "You put some of your %1$s in the %2$s's %3$s.", dropcount ),
287  n_gettext( "<npcname> puts some of their %1$s in the %2$s's %3$s.",
288  "<npcname> puts some of their %1$s in the %2$s's %3$s.", dropcount ),
289  it_name, veh.name, part_name
290  );
291  }
292  break;
293  case item_drop_reason::too_large:
294  c.add_msg_if_player(
295  n_gettext(
296  "There's no room in your inventory for the %s, so you drop it into the %s's %s.",
297  "There's no room in your inventory for the %s, so you drop them into the %s's %s.",
298  dropcount ),
299  it_name, veh.name, part_name
300  );
301  break;
302  case item_drop_reason::too_heavy:
303  c.add_msg_if_player(
304  n_gettext( "The %s is too heavy to carry, so you drop it into the %s's %s.",
305  "The %s are too heavy to carry, so you drop them into the %s's %s.", dropcount ),
306  it_name, veh.name, part_name
307  );
308  break;
309  case item_drop_reason::tumbling:
310  c.add_msg_if_player(
311  m_bad,
312  n_gettext( "Your %s tumbles into the %s's %s.",
313  "Your %s tumble into the %s's %s.", dropcount ),
314  it_name, veh.name, part_name
315  );
316  break;
317  }
318  } else {
319  switch( reason ) {
320  case item_drop_reason::deliberate:
321  c.add_msg_player_or_npc(
322  _( "You put several items in the %1$s's %2$s." ),
323  _( "<npcname> puts several items in the %1$s's %2$s." ),
324  veh.name, part_name
325  );
326  break;
327  case item_drop_reason::too_large:
328  case item_drop_reason::too_heavy:
329  case item_drop_reason::tumbling:
330  c.add_msg_if_player(
331  m_bad, _( "Some items tumble into the %1$s's %2$s." ),
332  veh.name, part_name
333  );
334  break;
335  }
336  }
337 }

339 std::vector<item_location> drop_on_map( Character &you, item_drop_reason reason,
340  const std::list<item> &items,
341  const tripoint_bub_ms &where )
342 {
343  if( items.empty() ) {
344  return {};
345  }
346  map &here = get_map();
347  const std::string ter_name = here.name( where );
348  const bool can_move_there = here.passable( where );
349 
350  if( same_type( items ) ) {
351  const item &it = items.front();
352  const int dropcount = items.size() * it.count();
353  const std::string it_name = it.tname( dropcount );
354 
355  switch( reason ) {
356  case item_drop_reason::deliberate:
357  if( can_move_there ) {
358  you.add_msg_player_or_npc(
359  n_gettext( "You drop your %1$s on the %2$s.",
360  "You drop your %1$s on the %2$s.", dropcount ),
361  n_gettext( "<npcname> drops their %1$s on the %2$s.",
362  "<npcname> drops their %1$s on the %2$s.", dropcount ),
363  it_name, ter_name
364  );
365  } else {
366  you.add_msg_player_or_npc(
367  n_gettext( "You put your %1$s in the %2$s.",
368  "You put your %1$s in the %2$s.", dropcount ),
369  n_gettext( "<npcname> puts their %1$s in the %2$s.",
370  "<npcname> puts their %1$s in the %2$s.", dropcount ),
371  it_name, ter_name
372  );
373  }
374  break;
375  case item_drop_reason::too_large:
376  you.add_msg_if_player(
377  n_gettext( "There's no room in your inventory for the %s, so you drop it.",
378  "There's no room in your inventory for the %s, so you drop them.", dropcount ),
379  it_name
380  );
381  break;
382  case item_drop_reason::too_heavy:
383  you.add_msg_if_player(
384  n_gettext( "The %s is too heavy to carry, so you drop it.",
385  "The %s is too heavy to carry, so you drop them.", dropcount ),
386  it_name
387  );
388  break;
389  case item_drop_reason::tumbling:
390  you.add_msg_if_player(
391  m_bad,
392  n_gettext( "Your %1$s tumbles to the %2$s.",
393  "Your %1$s tumble to the %2$s.", dropcount ),
394  it_name, ter_name
395  );
396  break;
397  }
398 
399  if( get_option<bool>( "AUTO_NOTES_DROPPED_FAVORITES" ) && it.is_favorite ) {
400  const tripoint_abs_omt your_pos = you.global_omt_location();
401  if( !overmap_buffer.has_note( your_pos ) ) {
402  overmap_buffer.add_note( your_pos, it.display_name() );
403  } else {
404  overmap_buffer.add_note( your_pos, overmap_buffer.note( your_pos ) + "; " + it.display_name() );
405  }
406  }
407  } else {
408  switch( reason ) {
409  case item_drop_reason::deliberate:
410  if( can_move_there ) {
411  you.add_msg_player_or_npc(
412  _( "You drop several items on the %s." ),
413  _( "<npcname> drops several items on the %s." ),
414  ter_name
415  );
416  } else {
417  you.add_msg_player_or_npc(
418  _( "You put several items in the %s." ),
419  _( "<npcname> puts several items in the %s." ),
420  ter_name
421  );
422  }
423  break;
424  case item_drop_reason::too_large:
425  case item_drop_reason::too_heavy:
426  case item_drop_reason::tumbling:
427  you.add_msg_if_player( m_bad, _( "Some items tumble to the %s." ), ter_name );
428  break;
429  }
430  }
431  std::vector<item_location> items_dropped;
432  for( const item &it : items ) {
433  item &dropped_item = here.add_item_or_charges( where, it );
434  items_dropped.emplace_back( map_cursor( where.raw() ), &dropped_item );
435  item( it ).handle_pickup_ownership( you );
436  }
437 
438  you.recoil = MAX_RECOIL;
439  return items_dropped;
440 }

442 void put_into_vehicle_or_drop( Character &you, item_drop_reason reason,
443  const std::list<item> &items )
444 {
445  return put_into_vehicle_or_drop( you, reason, items, you.pos_bub() );
446 }
447 
448 void put_into_vehicle_or_drop( Character &you, item_drop_reason reason,
449  const std::list<item> &items,
450  const tripoint_bub_ms &where, bool force_ground )
451 {
452  map &here = get_map();
453  const std::optional<vpart_reference> vp = here.veh_at( where ).cargo();
454  if( vp && !force_ground ) {
455  put_into_vehicle( you, reason, items, *vp );
456  return;
457  }
458  drop_on_map( you, reason, items, where );
459 }
460 
461 static double get_capacity_fraction( int capacity, int volume )
462 {
463  // fraction of capacity the item would occupy
464  // fr = 1 is for capacity smaller than is size of item
465  // in such case, let's assume player does the trip for full cost with item in hands
466  double fr = 1;
467 
468  if( capacity > volume ) {
469  fr = static_cast<double>( volume ) / capacity;
470  }
471 
472  return fr;
473 }
474 
475 int activity_handlers::move_cost_inv( const item &it, const tripoint_bub_ms &src,
476  const tripoint_bub_ms &dest )
477 {
478  // to prevent potentially ridiculous number
479  const int MAX_COST = 500;
480 
481  // it seems that pickup cost is flat 100
482  // in function pick_one_up, variable moves_taken has initial value of 100
483  // and never changes until it is finally used in function
484  // remove_from_map_or_vehicle
485  const int pickup_cost = 100;
486 
487  // drop cost for non-tumbling items (from inventory overload) is also flat 100
488  // according to convert_to_items (it does contain todo to use calculated costs)
489  const int drop_cost = 100;
490 
491  // typical flat ground move cost
492  const int mc_per_tile = 100;
493 
494  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
495  // only free inventory capacity
496  const int inventory_capacity = units::to_milliliter( player_character.volume_capacity() -
497  player_character.volume_carried() );
498 
499  const int item_volume = units::to_milliliter( it.volume() );
500 
501  const double fr = get_capacity_fraction( inventory_capacity, item_volume );
502 
503  // approximation of movement cost between source and destination
504  const int move_cost = mc_per_tile * rl_dist( src, dest ) * fr;
505 
506  return std::min( pickup_cost + drop_cost + move_cost, MAX_COST );
507 }
508 
509 int activity_handlers::move_cost_cart(
510  const item &it, const tripoint_bub_ms &src, const tripoint_bub_ms &dest,
511  const units::volume &capacity )
512 {
513  // to prevent potentially ridiculous number
514  const int MAX_COST = 500;
515 
516  // cost to move item into the cart
517  const int pickup_cost = Pickup::cost_to_move_item( get_player_character(), it );
518 
519  // cost to move item out of the cart
520  const int drop_cost = pickup_cost;
521 
522  // typical flat ground move cost
523  const int mc_per_tile = 100;
524 
525  // only free cart capacity
526  const int cart_capacity = units::to_milliliter( capacity );
527 
528  const int item_volume = units::to_milliliter( it.volume() );
529 
530  const double fr = get_capacity_fraction( cart_capacity, item_volume );
531 
532  // approximation of movement cost between source and destination
533  const int move_cost = mc_per_tile * rl_dist( src, dest ) * fr;
534 
535  return std::min( pickup_cost + drop_cost + move_cost, MAX_COST );
536 }
537 
538 int activity_handlers::move_cost( const item &it, const tripoint_bub_ms &src,
539  const tripoint_bub_ms &dest )
540 {
541  avatar &player_character = get_avatar();
542  if( player_character.get_grab_type() == object_type::VEHICLE ) {
543  const tripoint cart_position = player_character.pos() + player_character.grab_point;
544  if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> ovp = get_map().veh_at( cart_position ).cargo() ) {
545  return move_cost_cart( it, src, dest, ovp->items().free_volume() );
546  }
547  }
548 
549  return move_cost_inv( it, src, dest );
550 }
551 
552 // return true if activity was assigned.
553 // return false if it was not possible.
554 static bool vehicle_activity( Character &you, const tripoint_bub_ms &src_loc, int vpindex,
555  char type )
556 {
557  map &here = get_map();
558  vehicle *veh = veh_pointer_or_null( here.veh_at( src_loc ) );
559  if( !veh ) {
560  return false;
561  }
562  time_duration time_to_take = 0_seconds;
563  if( vpindex >= veh->part_count() ) {
564  // if parts got removed during our work, we can't just carry on removing, we want to repair parts!
565  // so just bail out, as we don't know if the next shifted part is suitable for repair.
566  if( type == 'r' ) {
567  return false;
568  } else if( type == 'o' ) {
569  vpindex = veh->get_next_shifted_index( vpindex, you );
570  if( vpindex == -1 ) {
571  return false;
572  }
573  }
574  }
575  const vehicle_part &vp = veh->part( vpindex );
576  const vpart_info &vpi = vp.info();
577  if( type == 'r' ) {
578  const int frac = ( vp.damage() - vp.degradation() ) / ( vp.max_damage() - vp.degradation() );
579  time_to_take = vpi.repair_time( you ) * frac;
580  } else if( type == 'o' ) {
581  time_to_take = vpi.removal_time( you );
582  }
583  you.assign_activity( ACT_VEHICLE, to_moves<int>( time_to_take ), static_cast<int>( type ) );
584  // so , NPCs can remove the last part on a position, then there is no vehicle there anymore,
585  // for someone else who stored that position at the start of their activity.
586  // so we may need to go looking a bit further afield to find it , at activities end.
587  for( const tripoint &pt : veh->get_points( true ) ) {
588  you.activity.coord_set.insert( here.getabs( pt ) );
589  }
590  // values[0]
591  you.activity.values.push_back( here.getabs( src_loc ).x );
592  // values[1]
593  you.activity.values.push_back( here.getabs( src_loc ).y );
594  // values[2]
595  you.activity.values.push_back( point_zero.x );
596  // values[3]
597  you.activity.values.push_back( point_zero.y );
598  // values[4]
599  you.activity.values.push_back( -point_zero.x );
600  // values[5]
601  you.activity.values.push_back( -point_zero.y );
602  // values[6]
603  you.activity.values.push_back( veh->index_of_part( &vp ) );
604  you.activity.str_values.push_back( vpi.id.str() );
605  you.activity.str_values.push_back( vp.variant );
606  // this would only be used for refilling tasks
607  item_location target;
608  you.activity.targets.emplace_back( std::move( target ) );
609  you.activity.placement = here.getglobal( src_loc );
610  you.activity_vehicle_part_index = -1;
611  return true;
612 }
613 
614 static void move_item( Character &you, item &it, const int quantity, const tripoint_bub_ms &src,
615  const tripoint_bub_ms &dest, const std::optional<vpart_reference> &vpr_src,
616  const activity_id &activity_to_restore = activity_id::NULL_ID() )
617 {
618  item leftovers = it;
619 
620  if( quantity != 0 && it.count_by_charges() ) {
621  // Reinserting leftovers happens after item removal to avoid stacking issues.
622  leftovers.charges = it.charges - quantity;
623  if( leftovers.charges > 0 ) {
624  it.charges = quantity;
625  }
626  } else {
627  leftovers.charges = 0;
628  }
629 
630  map &here = get_map();
631  // Check that we can pick it up.
632  if( !it.made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
633  you.mod_moves( -activity_handlers::move_cost( it, src, dest ) );
634  if( activity_to_restore == ACT_TIDY_UP ) {
635  it.erase_var( "activity_var" );
636  } else if( activity_to_restore == ACT_FETCH_REQUIRED ) {
637  it.set_var( "activity_var", you.name );
638  }
639  put_into_vehicle_or_drop( you, item_drop_reason::deliberate, { it }, dest );
640  // Remove from map or vehicle.
641  if( vpr_src ) {
642  vpr_src->vehicle().remove_item( vpr_src->part(), &it );
643  } else {
644  here.i_rem( src, &it );
645  }
646  }
647 
648  // If we didn't pick up a whole stack, put the remainder back where it came from.
649  if( leftovers.charges > 0 ) {
650  if( vpr_src ) {
651  if( !vpr_src->vehicle().add_item( vpr_src->part(), leftovers ) ) {
652  debugmsg( "SortLoot: Source vehicle failed to receive leftover charges." );
653  }
654  } else {
655  here.add_item_or_charges( src, leftovers );
656  }
657  }
658 }
659 
660 std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> route_adjacent( const Character &you, const tripoint_bub_ms &dest )
661 {
662  std::unordered_set<tripoint_bub_ms> passable_tiles;
663  map &here = get_map();
664 
665  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &tp : here.points_in_radius( dest, 1 ) ) {
666  if( tp != you.pos_bub() && here.passable( tp ) ) {
667  passable_tiles.emplace( tp );
668  }
669  }
670 
671  const std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> &sorted =
672  get_sorted_tiles_by_distance( you.pos_bub(), passable_tiles );
673 
674  const std::unordered_set<tripoint> &avoid = you.get_path_avoid();
675  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &tp : sorted ) {
676  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> route =
677  here.route( you.pos_bub(), tp, you.get_pathfinding_settings(), avoid );
678 
679  if( !route.empty() ) {
680  return route;
681  }
682  }
683 
684  return {};
685 }
686 
687 static std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> route_best_workbench(
688  const Character &you, const tripoint_bub_ms &dest )
689 {
690  std::unordered_set<tripoint_bub_ms> passable_tiles;
691  map &here = get_map();
692  creature_tracker &creatures = get_creature_tracker();
693  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &tp : here.points_in_radius( dest, 1 ) ) {
694  if( tp == you.pos_bub() || ( here.passable( tp ) && !creatures.creature_at( tp ) ) ) {
695  passable_tiles.insert( tp );
696  }
697  }
698  // Make sure current tile is at first
699  // so that the "best" tile doesn't change on reaching our destination
700  // if we are near the best workbench
701  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> sorted =
702  get_sorted_tiles_by_distance( you.pos_bub(), passable_tiles );
703 
704  const auto cmp = [&]( const tripoint_bub_ms & a, const tripoint_bub_ms & b ) {
705  float best_bench_multi_a = 0.0f;
706  float best_bench_multi_b = 0.0f;
707  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &adj : here.points_in_radius( a, 1 ) ) {
708  if( here.dangerous_field_at( adj ) ) {
709  continue;
710  }
711  if( const cata::value_ptr<furn_workbench_info> &wb = here.furn( adj ).obj().workbench ) {
712  if( wb->multiplier > best_bench_multi_a ) {
713  best_bench_multi_a = wb->multiplier;
714  }
715  } else if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> vp = here.veh_at(
716  adj ).part_with_feature( "WORKBENCH", true ) ) {
717  if( const std::optional<vpslot_workbench> &wb_info = vp->part().info().workbench_info ) {
718  if( wb_info->multiplier > best_bench_multi_a ) {
719  best_bench_multi_a = wb_info->multiplier;
720  }
721  } else {
722  debugmsg( "part '%s' with WORKBENCH flag has no workbench info", vp->part().name() );
723  }
724  }
725  }
726  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &adj : here.points_in_radius( b, 1 ) ) {
727  if( here.dangerous_field_at( adj ) ) {
728  continue;
729  }
730  if( const cata::value_ptr<furn_workbench_info> &wb = here.furn( adj ).obj().workbench ) {
731  if( wb->multiplier > best_bench_multi_b ) {
732  best_bench_multi_b = wb->multiplier;
733  }
734  } else if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> vp = here.veh_at(
735  adj ).part_with_feature( "WORKBENCH", true ) ) {
736  if( const std::optional<vpslot_workbench> &wb_info = vp->part().info().workbench_info ) {
737  if( wb_info->multiplier > best_bench_multi_b ) {
738  best_bench_multi_b = wb_info->multiplier;
739  }
740  } else {
741  debugmsg( "part '%s' with WORKBENCH flag has no workbench info", vp->part().name() );
742  }
743  }
744  }
745  return best_bench_multi_a > best_bench_multi_b;
746  };
747  std::stable_sort( sorted.begin(), sorted.end(), cmp );
748  const std::unordered_set<tripoint> &avoid = you.get_path_avoid();
749  if( sorted.front() == you.pos_bub() ) {
750  // We are on the best tile
751  return {};
752  }
753  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &tp : sorted ) {
754  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> route =
755  here.route( you.pos_bub(), tp, you.get_pathfinding_settings(), avoid );
756 
757  if( !route.empty() ) {
758  return route;
759  }
760  }
761  return {};
762 
763 }
764 
765 namespace
766 {
767 
768 bool _can_construct(
769  tripoint_bub_ms const &loc, construction_id const &idx, construction const &check,
770  std::optional<construction_id> const &part_con_idx )
771 {
772  return ( part_con_idx && *part_con_idx == check.id ) ||
773  ( check.pre_terrain != idx->post_terrain && can_construct( check, loc ) );
774 }
775 
776 construction const *
777 _find_alt_construction( tripoint_bub_ms const &loc, construction_id const &idx,
778  std::optional<construction_id> const &part_con_idx,
779  std::function<bool( construction const & )> const &filter )
780 {
781  std::vector<construction *> cons = constructions_by_filter( filter );
782  for( construction const *el : cons ) {
783  if( _can_construct( loc, idx, *el, part_con_idx ) ) {
784  return el;
785  }
786  }
787  return nullptr;
788 }
789 
790 template <class ID>
791 ID _get_id( construction_id const &idx )
792 {
793  return idx->post_terrain.empty() ? ID() : ID( idx->post_terrain );
794 }
795 
796 using checked_cache_t = std::vector<construction_id>;
797 construction const *_find_prereq( tripoint_bub_ms const &loc, construction_id const &idx,
798  construction_id const &top_idx,
799  std::optional<construction_id> const &part_con_idx, checked_cache_t &checked_cache )
800 {
801  construction const *con = nullptr;
802  std::vector<construction *> cons = constructions_by_filter( [&idx, &top_idx](
803  construction const & it ) {
804  furn_id const f = top_idx->post_is_furniture ? _get_id<furn_id>( top_idx ) : furn_id();
805  ter_id const t = top_idx->post_is_furniture ? ter_id() : _get_id<ter_id>( top_idx );
806  return it.group != idx->group && !it.post_terrain.empty() &&
807  it.post_terrain == idx->pre_terrain &&
808  // don't get stuck building and deconstructing the top level post_terrain
809  it.pre_terrain != top_idx->post_terrain &&
810  ( it.pre_flags.empty() || !can_construct_furn_ter( it, f, t ) );
811  } );
812 
813  for( construction const *gcon : cons ) {
814  if( std::find( checked_cache.begin(), checked_cache.end(), gcon->id ) !=
815  checked_cache.end() ) {
816  continue;
817  }
818  checked_cache.emplace_back( gcon->id );
819  if( _can_construct( loc, idx, *gcon, part_con_idx ) ) {
820  return gcon;
821  }
822  // try to find a prerequisite of this prerequisite
823  if( !gcon->pre_terrain.empty() || !gcon->pre_flags.empty() ) {
824  con = _find_prereq( loc, gcon->id, top_idx, part_con_idx, checked_cache );
825  }
826  if( con != nullptr ) {
827  return con;
828  }
829  }
830  return nullptr;
831 }
832 
833 bool already_done( construction const &build, tripoint_bub_ms const &loc )
834 {
835  map &here = get_map();
836  const furn_id furn = here.furn( loc );
837  const ter_id ter = here.ter( loc );
838  return !build.post_terrain.empty() &&
839  ( ( !build.post_is_furniture && ter_id( build.post_terrain ) == ter ) ||
840  ( build.post_is_furniture && furn_id( build.post_terrain ) == furn ) );
841 }
842 
843 } // namespace
844 
845 static activity_reason_info find_base_construction(
846  Character &you,
847  const inventory &inv,
848  const tripoint_bub_ms &loc,
849  const std::optional<construction_id> &part_con_idx,
850  const construction_id &idx )
851 {
852  if( already_done( idx.obj(), loc ) ) {
853  return activity_reason_info::build( do_activity_reason::ALREADY_DONE, false, idx->id );
854  }
855  bool cc = can_construct( idx.obj(), loc );
856  construction const *con = nullptr;
857 
858  if( !cc ) {
859  // try to build a variant from the same group
860  con = _find_alt_construction( loc, idx, part_con_idx, [&idx]( construction const & it ) {
861  return it.group == idx->group;
862  } );
863  if( !idx->strict && con == nullptr ) {
864  // try to build a pre-requisite from a different group, recursively
865  checked_cache_t checked_cache;
866  for( construction const *vcon : constructions_by_group( idx->group ) ) {
867  con = _find_prereq( loc, vcon->id, vcon->id, part_con_idx, checked_cache );
868  if( con != nullptr ) {
869  break;
870  }
871  }
872  }
873  cc = con != nullptr;
874  }
875 
876  const construction &build = con == nullptr ? idx.obj() : *con;
877  bool pcb = player_can_build( you, inv, build, true );
878  //already done?
879  if( already_done( build, loc ) ) {
880  return activity_reason_info::build( do_activity_reason::ALREADY_DONE, false, build.id );
881  }
882 
883  const bool has_skill = you.meets_skill_requirements( build );
884  if( !has_skill ) {
885  return activity_reason_info::build( do_activity_reason::DONT_HAVE_SKILL, false, build.id );
886  }
887  //if there's an appropriate partial construction on the tile, then we can work on it, no need to check inventories.
888  if( part_con_idx ) {
889  if( *part_con_idx != build.id ) {
890  //have a partial construction which is not leading to the required construction
891  return activity_reason_info::build( do_activity_reason::BLOCKING_TILE, false, idx );
892  }
893  return activity_reason_info::build( do_activity_reason::CAN_DO_CONSTRUCTION, true, build.id );
894  }
895  //can build?
896  if( cc ) {
897  if( pcb ) {
898  return activity_reason_info::build( do_activity_reason::CAN_DO_CONSTRUCTION, true, build.id );
899  }
900  //can't build with current inventory, do not look for pre-req
901  return activity_reason_info::build( do_activity_reason::NO_COMPONENTS, false, build.id );
902  }
903 
904  return activity_reason_info::build( do_activity_reason::BLOCKING_TILE, false, idx );
905 }
906 
907 static bool are_requirements_nearby(
908  const std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> &loot_spots, const requirement_id &needed_things,
909  Character &you, const activity_id &activity_to_restore, const bool in_loot_zones,
910  const tripoint_bub_ms &src_loc )
911 {
912  zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
913  temp_crafting_inventory temp_inv;
914  units::volume volume_allowed;
915  units::mass weight_allowed;
916  static const auto check_weight_if = []( const activity_id & id ) {
917  return id == ACT_MULTIPLE_FARM ||
918  id == ACT_MULTIPLE_CHOP_PLANKS ||
919  id == ACT_MULTIPLE_BUTCHER ||
920  id == ACT_VEHICLE_DECONSTRUCTION ||
921  id == ACT_VEHICLE_REPAIR ||
922  id == ACT_MULTIPLE_CHOP_TREES ||
923  id == ACT_MULTIPLE_FISH ||
924  id == ACT_MULTIPLE_MINE ||
925  id == ACT_MULTIPLE_MOP;
926  };
927  const bool check_weight = check_weight_if( activity_to_restore ) || ( !you.backlog.empty() &&
928  check_weight_if( you.backlog.front().id() ) );
929 
930  if( check_weight ) {
931  volume_allowed = you.volume_capacity() - you.volume_carried();
932  weight_allowed = you.weight_capacity() - you.weight_carried();
933  }
934 
935  bool found_welder = false;
936  for( item *elem : you.inv_dump() ) {
937  if( elem->has_quality( qual_WELD ) ) {
938  found_welder = true;
939  }
940  temp_inv.add_item_ref( *elem );
941  }
942  map &here = get_map();
943  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &elem : loot_spots ) {
944  // if we are searching for things to fetch, we can skip certain things.
945  // if, however they are already near the work spot, then the crafting / inventory functions will have their own method to use or discount them.
946  if( in_loot_zones ) {
947  // skip tiles in IGNORE zone and tiles on fire
948  // (to prevent taking out wood off the lit brazier)
949  // and inaccessible furniture, like filled charcoal kiln
950  if( mgr.has( zone_type_LOOT_IGNORE, here.getglobal( elem ), _fac_id( you ) ) ||
951  here.dangerous_field_at( elem ) ||
952  !here.can_put_items_ter_furn( elem ) ) {
953  continue;
954  }
955  }
956  for( item &elem2 : here.i_at( elem ) ) {
957  if( in_loot_zones ) {
958  if( elem2.made_of_from_type( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
959  continue;
960  }
961 
962  if( check_weight ) {
963  // this fetch task will need to pick up an item. so check for its weight/volume before setting off.
964  if( elem2.volume() > volume_allowed ||
965  elem2.weight() > weight_allowed ) {
966  continue;
967  }
968  }
969  }
970  temp_inv.add_item_ref( elem2 );
971  }
972 
973  if( !in_loot_zones ) {
974  if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> ovp = here.veh_at( elem ).cargo() ) {
975  for( item &it : ovp->items() ) {
976  temp_inv.add_item_ref( it );
977  }
978  }
979  }
980  }
981  // use nearby welding rig without needing to drag it or position yourself on the right side of the vehicle.
982  if( !found_welder ) {
983  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &elem : here.points_in_radius( src_loc, PICKUP_RANGE - 1,
984  PICKUP_RANGE - 1 ) ) {
985  const std::optional<vpart_reference> &vp = here.veh_at( elem ).part_with_tool( itype_welder );
986 
987  if( vp ) {
988  const int veh_battery = vp->vehicle().fuel_left( itype_battery );
989 
990  item welder( itype_welder, calendar::turn_zero );
991  welder.charges = veh_battery;
992  welder.set_flag( flag_PSEUDO );
993  temp_inv.add_item_copy( welder );
994  item soldering_iron( itype_soldering_iron, calendar::turn_zero );
995  soldering_iron.charges = veh_battery;
996  soldering_iron.set_flag( flag_PSEUDO );
997  temp_inv.add_item_copy( soldering_iron );
998  }
999  }
1000  }
1001  return needed_things.obj().can_make_with_inventory( temp_inv, is_crafting_component );
1002 }
1003 
1004 static activity_reason_info can_do_activity_there( const activity_id &act, Character &you,
1005  const tripoint_bub_ms &src_loc, const int distance = ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE )
1006 {
1007  // see activity_handlers.h cant_do_activity_reason enums
1008  you.invalidate_crafting_inventory();
1009  zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
1010  std::vector<zone_data> zones;
1011  Character &player_character = get_player_character();
1012  map &here = get_map();
1013  if( act == ACT_VEHICLE_DECONSTRUCTION ||
1014  act == ACT_VEHICLE_REPAIR ) {
1015  std::vector<int> already_working_indexes;
1016  vehicle *veh = veh_pointer_or_null( here.veh_at( src_loc ) );
1017  if( !veh || veh->is_appliance() ) {
1018  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NO_ZONE );
1019  }
1020  // if the vehicle is moving or player is controlling it.
1021  if( std::abs( veh->velocity ) > 100 || veh->player_in_control( player_character ) ) {
1022  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NO_ZONE );
1023  }
1024  for( const npc &guy : g->all_npcs() ) {
1025  if( &guy == &you ) {
1026  continue;
1027  }
1028  // If the NPC has an activity - make sure they're not duplicating work.
1029  tripoint_bub_ms guy_work_spot;
1030  if( guy.has_player_activity() &&
1031  guy.activity.placement != player_activity::invalid_place ) {
1032  guy_work_spot = here.bub_from_abs( guy.activity.placement );
1033  }
1034  // If their position or intended position or player position/intended position
1035  // then discount, don't need to move each other out of the way.
1036  if( here.bub_from_abs( player_character.activity.placement ) == src_loc ||
1037  guy_work_spot == src_loc || guy.pos_bub() == src_loc ||
1038  ( you.is_npc() && player_character.pos_bub() == src_loc ) ) {
1039  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::ALREADY_WORKING );
1040  }
1041  if( guy_work_spot != tripoint_bub_ms{} ) {
1042  vehicle *other_veh = veh_pointer_or_null( here.veh_at( guy_work_spot ) );
1043  // working on same vehicle - store the index to check later.
1044  if( other_veh && other_veh == veh && guy.activity_vehicle_part_index != -1 ) {
1045  already_working_indexes.push_back( guy.activity_vehicle_part_index );
1046  }
1047  }
1048  if( player_character.activity_vehicle_part_index != -1 ) {
1049  already_working_indexes.push_back( player_character.activity_vehicle_part_index );
1050  }
1051  }
1052  if( act == ACT_VEHICLE_DECONSTRUCTION ) {
1053  // find out if there is a vehicle part here we can remove.
1054  // TODO: fix point types
1055  std::vector<vehicle_part *> parts =
1056  veh->get_parts_at( src_loc.raw(), "", part_status_flag::any );
1057  for( vehicle_part *part_elem : parts ) {
1058  const int vpindex = veh->index_of_part( part_elem, true );
1059  // if part is not on this vehicle, or if its attached to another part that needs to be removed first.
1060  if( vpindex < 0 || !veh->can_unmount( *part_elem ).success() ) {
1061  continue;
1062  }
1063  const vpart_info &vpinfo = part_elem->info();
1064  // If removing this part would make the vehicle non-flyable, avoid it
1065  if( veh->would_removal_prevent_flyable( *part_elem, player_character ) ) {
1066  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::WOULD_PREVENT_VEH_FLYING );
1067  }
1068  // this is the same part that somebody else wants to work on, or already is.
1069  if( std::find( already_working_indexes.begin(), already_working_indexes.end(),
1070  vpindex ) != already_working_indexes.end() ) {
1071  continue;
1072  }
1073  // don't have skill to remove it
1074  if( !you.meets_skill_requirements( vpinfo.removal_skills ) ) {
1075  continue;
1076  }
1077  item base( vpinfo.base_item );
1078  // TODO: fix point types
1079  const units::mass max_lift = you.best_nearby_lifting_assist( src_loc.raw() );
1080  const bool use_aid = max_lift >= base.weight();
1081  const bool use_str = you.can_lift( base );
1082  if( !( use_aid || use_str ) ) {
1083  continue;
1084  }
1085  const requirement_data &reqs = vpinfo.removal_requirements();
1086  const inventory &inv = you.crafting_inventory( false );
1087 
1088  const bool can_make = reqs.can_make_with_inventory( inv, is_crafting_component );
1089  you.set_value( "veh_index_type", vpinfo.name() );
1090  // temporarily store the intended index, we do this so two NPCs don't try and work on the same part at same time.
1091  you.activity_vehicle_part_index = vpindex;
1092  if( !can_make ) {
1093  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_VEH_DECONST );
1094  } else {
1095  return activity_reason_info::ok( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_VEH_DECONST );
1096  }
1097  }
1098  } else if( act == ACT_VEHICLE_REPAIR ) {
1099  // find out if there is a vehicle part here we can repair.
1100  // TODO: fix point types
1101  std::vector<vehicle_part *> parts = veh->get_parts_at( src_loc.raw(), "", part_status_flag::any );
1102  for( vehicle_part *part_elem : parts ) {
1103  const vpart_info &vpinfo = part_elem->info();
1104  int vpindex = veh->index_of_part( part_elem, true );
1105  // if part is undamaged or beyond repair - can skip it.
1106  if( !part_elem->is_repairable() ) {
1107  continue;
1108  }
1109  // If repairing this part would make the vehicle non-flyable, avoid it
1110  if( veh->would_repair_prevent_flyable( *part_elem, player_character ) ) {
1111  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::WOULD_PREVENT_VEH_FLYING );
1112  }
1113  if( std::find( already_working_indexes.begin(), already_working_indexes.end(),
1114  vpindex ) != already_working_indexes.end() ) {
1115  continue;
1116  }
1117  // don't have skill to repair it
1118 
1119  if( !you.meets_skill_requirements( vpinfo.repair_skills ) ) {
1120  continue;
1121  }
1122  const requirement_data &reqs = vpinfo.repair_requirements();
1123  // TODO: fix point types
1124  const inventory &inv =
1125  you.crafting_inventory( src_loc.raw(), PICKUP_RANGE - 1, false );
1126  const bool can_make = reqs.can_make_with_inventory( inv, is_crafting_component );
1127  you.set_value( "veh_index_type", vpinfo.name() );
1128  // temporarily store the intended index, we do this so two NPCs don't try and work on the same part at same time.
1129  you.activity_vehicle_part_index = vpindex;
1130  if( !can_make ) {
1131  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_VEH_REPAIR );
1132  } else {
1133  return activity_reason_info::ok( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_VEH_REPAIR );
1134  }
1135  }
1136  }
1137  you.activity_vehicle_part_index = -1;
1138  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NO_ZONE );
1139  }
1140  if( act == ACT_MULTIPLE_MINE ) {
1141  if( !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_MINEABLE, src_loc ) ) {
1142  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NO_ZONE );
1143  }
1144  std::vector<item *> mining_inv = you.items_with( [&you]( const item & itm ) {
1145  return ( itm.has_flag( flag_DIG_TOOL ) && !itm.type->can_use( "JACKHAMMER" ) ) ||
1146  ( itm.type->can_use( "JACKHAMMER" ) && itm.ammo_sufficient( &you ) );
1147  } );
1148  if( mining_inv.empty() ) {
1149  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_MINING );
1150  } else {
1151  return activity_reason_info::ok( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_MINING );
1152  }
1153  }
1154  if( act == ACT_MULTIPLE_MOP ) {
1155  if( !here.terrain_moppable( src_loc ) ) {
1156  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NO_ZONE );
1157  }
1158 
1159  if( you.cache_has_item_with( json_flag_MOP ) ) {
1160  return activity_reason_info::ok( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_MOP );
1161  } else {
1162  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_MOP );
1163  }
1164  }
1165  if( act == ACT_MULTIPLE_FISH ) {
1166  if( !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FISHABLE, src_loc ) ) {
1167  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NO_ZONE );
1168  }
1169  std::vector<item *> rod_inv = you.items_with( []( const item & itm ) {
1170  return itm.has_quality( qual_FISHING_ROD );
1171  } );
1172  if( rod_inv.empty() ) {
1173  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_FISHING );
1174  } else {
1175  return activity_reason_info::ok( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_FISHING );
1176  }
1177  }
1178  if( act == ACT_MULTIPLE_CHOP_TREES ) {
1179  if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_TREE, src_loc ) || here.ter( src_loc ) == ter_t_trunk ||
1180  here.ter( src_loc ) == ter_t_stump ) {
1181  if( you.has_quality( qual_AXE ) ) {
1182  return activity_reason_info::ok( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_TREE_CHOPPING );
1183  } else {
1184  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_TREE_CHOPPING );
1185  }
1186  } else {
1187  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NO_ZONE );
1188  }
1189  }
1190  if( act == ACT_MULTIPLE_BUTCHER ) {
1191  std::vector<item> corpses;
1192  int big_count = 0;
1193  int small_count = 0;
1194  for( const item &i : here.i_at( src_loc ) ) {
1195  // make sure nobody else is working on that corpse right now
1196  if( i.is_corpse() && !i.has_var( "activity_var" ) ) {
1197  const mtype corpse = *i.get_mtype();
1198  if( corpse.size >= creature_size::medium ) {
1199  big_count += 1;
1200  } else {
1201  small_count += 1;
1202  }
1203  corpses.push_back( i );
1204  }
1205  }
1206  bool b_rack_present = false;
1207  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &pt : here.points_in_radius( src_loc, 2 ) ) {
1208  if( here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_BUTCHER_EQ, pt ) ) {
1209  b_rack_present = true;
1210  }
1211  }
1212  if( !corpses.empty() ) {
1213  if( big_count > 0 && small_count == 0 ) {
1214  if( !b_rack_present || !here.has_nearby_table( src_loc, 2 ) ) {
1215  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NO_ZONE );
1216  }
1217  if( you.has_quality( quality_id( qual_BUTCHER ), 1 ) && ( you.has_quality( qual_SAW_W ) ||
1218  you.has_quality( qual_SAW_M ) ) ) {
1219  return activity_reason_info::ok( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_BIG_BUTCHERING );
1220  } else {
1221  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_BIG_BUTCHERING );
1222  }
1223  }
1224  if( ( big_count > 0 && small_count > 0 ) || ( big_count == 0 ) ) {
1225  // there are small corpses here, so we can ignore any big corpses here for the moment.
1226  if( you.has_quality( qual_BUTCHER, 1 ) ) {
1227  return activity_reason_info::ok( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_BUTCHERING );
1228  } else {
1229  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_BUTCHERING );
1230  }
1231  }
1232  }
1233  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NO_ZONE );
1234  }
1235  if( act == ACT_MULTIPLE_READ ) {
1236  const item_filter filter = [ &you ]( const item & i ) {
1237  // Check well lit after
1238  read_condition_result condition = you.check_read_condition( i );
1239  return condition == read_condition_result::SUCCESS ||
1240  condition == read_condition_result::TOO_DARK;
1241  };
1242  if( !you.items_with( filter ).empty() ) {
1243  return activity_reason_info::ok( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_BOOK_TO_LEARN );
1244  }
1245  // TODO: find books from zone?
1246  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::ALREADY_DONE );
1247  }
1248  if( act == ACT_MULTIPLE_CHOP_PLANKS ) {
1249  //are there even any logs there?
1250  for( item &i : here.i_at( src_loc ) ) {
1251  if( i.typeId() == itype_log ) {
1252  // do we have an axe?
1253  if( you.has_quality( qual_AXE, 1 ) ) {
1254  return activity_reason_info::ok( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CHOPPING );
1255  } else {
1256  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CHOPPING );
1257  }
1258  }
1259  }
1260  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NO_ZONE );
1261  }
1262  if( act == ACT_TIDY_UP ) {
1263  if( mgr.has_near( zone_type_LOOT_UNSORTED, here.getglobal( src_loc ), distance, _fac_id( you ) ) ||
1264  mgr.has_near( zone_type_CAMP_STORAGE, here.getglobal( src_loc ), distance, _fac_id( you ) ) ) {
1265  return activity_reason_info::ok( do_activity_reason::CAN_DO_FETCH );
1266  }
1267  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NO_ZONE );
1268  }
1269  if( act == ACT_MULTIPLE_CONSTRUCTION ) {
1270  zones = mgr.get_zones( zone_type_CONSTRUCTION_BLUEPRINT,
1271  here.getglobal( src_loc ), _fac_id( you ) );
1272  // TODO: fix point types
1273  const partial_con *part_con = here.partial_con_at( tripoint_bub_ms( src_loc ) );
1274  std::optional<construction_id> part_con_idx;
1275  if( part_con ) {
1276  part_con_idx = part_con->id;
1277  }
1278 
1279  tripoint_bub_ms nearest_src_loc;
1280  if( square_dist( you.pos_bub(), src_loc ) == 1 ) {
1281  nearest_src_loc = you.pos_bub();
1282  } else {
1283  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> const route = route_adjacent( you, src_loc );
1284  if( route.empty() ) {
1285  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::BLOCKING_TILE );
1286  }
1287  nearest_src_loc = route.back();
1288  }
1289  // TODO: fix point types
1290  const inventory pre_inv = you.crafting_inventory( nearest_src_loc.raw(), PICKUP_RANGE );
1291  if( !zones.empty() ) {
1292  const blueprint_options &options = dynamic_cast<const blueprint_options &>
1293  ( zones.front().get_options() );
1294  const construction_id index = options.get_index();
1295  // TODO: fix point types
1296  return find_base_construction( you, pre_inv, tripoint_bub_ms( src_loc ), part_con_idx,
1297  index );
1298  }
1299  } else if( act == ACT_MULTIPLE_FARM ) {
1300  zones = mgr.get_zones( zone_type_FARM_PLOT, here.getglobal( src_loc ), _fac_id( you ) );
1301  for( const zone_data &zone : zones ) {
1302  const plot_options &options = dynamic_cast<const plot_options &>( zone.get_options() );
1303  const itype_id seed = options.get_seed();
1304 
1305  if( here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GROWTH_OVERGROWN, src_loc ) ) {
1306  return activity_reason_info::ok( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CLEARING );
1307  }
1308 
1309  if( here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GROWTH_HARVEST, src_loc ) ) {
1310  map_stack items = here.i_at( src_loc );
1311  const map_stack::iterator seed = std::find_if( items.begin(), items.end(), []( const item & it ) {
1312  return it.is_seed();
1313  } );
1314  if( seed->has_flag( json_flag_CUT_HARVEST ) ) {
1315  // The plant in this location needs a grass cutting tool.
1316  if( you.has_quality( quality_id( qual_GRASS_CUT ), 1 ) ) {
1317  return activity_reason_info::ok( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CUT_HARVESTING );
1318  } else {
1319  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CUT_HARVESTING );
1320  }
1321  } else {
1322  // We can harvest this plant without any tools.
1323  return activity_reason_info::ok( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_HARVESTING );
1324  }
1325  } else if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_PLOWABLE, src_loc ) && !here.has_furn( src_loc ) ) {
1326  if( you.has_quality( qual_DIG, 1 ) ) {
1327  // we have a shovel/hoe already, great
1328  return activity_reason_info::ok( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_TILLING );
1329  } else {
1330  // we need a shovel/hoe
1331  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_TILLING );
1332  }
1333  // do we have the required seed on our person?
1334  // If its a farm zone with no specified seed, and we've checked for tilling and harvesting.
1335  // then it means no further work can be done here
1336  } else if( !seed.is_empty() &&
1337  // TODO: fix point types
1338  warm_enough_to_plant( src_loc.raw() ) &&
1339  here.has_flag_ter_or_furn( seed->seed->required_terrain_flag, src_loc ) ) {
1340  if( here.has_items( src_loc ) ) {
1341  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::BLOCKING_TILE );
1342  } else {
1343  if( you.cache_has_item_with( "is_seed", &item::is_seed, [&seed]( const item & it ) {
1344  return it.typeId() == itype_id( seed );
1345  } ) ) {
1346  return activity_reason_info::ok( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_PLANTING );
1347  }
1348  // didn't find the seed, but maybe there are overlapping farm zones
1349  // and another of the zones is for a seed that we have
1350  // so loop again, and return false once all zones are done.
1351  }
1352 
1353  } else {
1354  // can't plant, till or harvest
1355  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::ALREADY_DONE );
1356  }
1357 
1358  }
1359  // looped through all zones, and only got here if its plantable, but have no seeds.
1360  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_PLANTING );
1361  } else if( act == ACT_FETCH_REQUIRED ) {
1362  // we check if its possible to get all the requirements for fetching at two other places.
1363  // 1. before we even assign the fetch activity and;
1364  // 2. when we form the src_set to loop through at the beginning of the fetch activity.
1365  return activity_reason_info::ok( do_activity_reason::CAN_DO_FETCH );
1366  } else if( act == ACT_MULTIPLE_CRAFT ) {
1367  // only npc is supported
1368  npc *p = you.as_npc();
1369  if( p ) {
1370  item_location to_craft = p->get_item_to_craft();
1371  if( to_craft && to_craft->is_craft() ) {
1372  const inventory &inv = you.crafting_inventory( src_loc.raw(), PICKUP_RANGE - 1, false );
1373  const recipe &r = to_craft->get_making();
1374  std::vector<std::vector<item_comp>> item_comp_vector =
1375  to_craft->get_continue_reqs().get_components();
1376  std::vector<std::vector<quality_requirement>> quality_comp_vector =
1377  r.simple_requirements().get_qualities();
1378  std::vector<std::vector<tool_comp>> tool_comp_vector = r.simple_requirements().get_tools();
1379  requirement_data req = requirement_data( tool_comp_vector, quality_comp_vector, item_comp_vector );
1380  if( req.can_make_with_inventory( inv, is_crafting_component ) ) {
1381  return activity_reason_info::ok( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CRAFT );
1382  } else {
1383  return activity_reason_info( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CRAFT, false, req );
1384  }
1385  }
1386  }
1387  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::ALREADY_DONE );
1388  } else if( act == ACT_MULTIPLE_DIS ) {
1389  // Is there anything to be disassembled?
1390  // TODO: fix point types
1391  const inventory &inv = you.crafting_inventory( src_loc.raw(), PICKUP_RANGE - 1, false );
1392  requirement_data req;
1393  for( item &i : here.i_at( src_loc ) ) {
1394  // Skip items marked by other ppl.
1395  if( i.has_var( "activity_var" ) && i.get_var( "activity_var" ) != you.name ) {
1396  continue;
1397  }
1398  //unmark the item before check
1399  i.erase_var( "activity_var" );
1400  if( i.is_disassemblable() ) {
1401  // Are the requirements fulfilled?
1402  const recipe &r = recipe_dictionary::get_uncraft( ( i.typeId() == itype_disassembly ) ?
1403  i.components.only_item().typeId() : i.typeId() );
1404  req = r.disassembly_requirements();
1405  if( !std::all_of( req.get_qualities().begin(),
1406  req.get_qualities().end(), [&inv]( const std::vector<quality_requirement> &cur ) {
1407  return cur.empty() ||
1408  std::any_of( cur.begin(), cur.end(), [&inv]( const quality_requirement & curr ) {
1409  return curr.has( inv, return_true<item> );
1410  } );
1411  } ) ) {
1412  continue;
1413  }
1414  if( !std::all_of( req.get_tools().begin(),
1415  req.get_tools().end(), [&inv]( const std::vector<tool_comp> &cur ) {
1416  return cur.empty() || std::any_of( cur.begin(), cur.end(), [&inv]( const tool_comp & curr ) {
1417  return curr.has( inv, return_true<item> );
1418  } );
1419  } ) ) {
1420  continue;
1421  }
1422  // check passed, mark the item
1423  i.set_var( "activity_var", you.name );
1424  return activity_reason_info::ok( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_DISASSEMBLE );
1425  }
1426  }
1427  if( !req.is_null() || !req.is_empty() ) {
1428  // need tools
1429  return activity_reason_info( do_activity_reason::NEEDS_DISASSEMBLE, false, req );
1430  } else {
1431  // nothing to disassemble
1432  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NO_ZONE );
1433  }
1434  }
1435  // Shouldn't get here because the zones were checked previously. if it does, set enum reason as "no zone"
1436  return activity_reason_info::fail( do_activity_reason::NO_ZONE );
1437 }
1438 
1439 static void add_basecamp_storage_to_loot_zone_list(
1440  zone_manager &mgr, const tripoint_bub_ms &src_loc, Character &you,
1441  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> &loot_zone_spots, std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> &combined_spots )
1442 {
1443  if( npc *const guy = dynamic_cast<npc *>( &you ) ) {
1444  map &here = get_map();
1445  if( guy->assigned_camp &&
1446  mgr.has_near( zone_type_CAMP_STORAGE, here.getglobal( src_loc ), ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE,
1447  _fac_id( you ) ) ) {
1448  std::unordered_set<tripoint_abs_ms> bc_storage_set =
1449  mgr.get_near( zone_type_CAMP_STORAGE, here.getglobal( src_loc ),
1450  ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE, nullptr, _fac_id( you ) );
1451  for( const tripoint_abs_ms &elem : bc_storage_set ) {
1452  tripoint_bub_ms here_local = here.bub_from_abs( elem );
1453 
1454  // Check that a coordinate is not already in the combined list, otherwise actions
1455  // like construction may erroneously count materials twice if an object is both
1456  // in the camp zone and in a loot zone.
1457  if( std::find( combined_spots.begin(), combined_spots.end(),
1458  here_local ) == combined_spots.end() ) {
1459  loot_zone_spots.push_back( here_local );
1460  combined_spots.push_back( here_local );
1461  }
1462  }
1463  }
1464  }
1465 }
1466 
1467 static std::vector<std::tuple<tripoint_bub_ms, itype_id, int>> requirements_map( Character &you,
1468  const int distance = ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE )
1469 {
1470  std::vector<std::tuple<tripoint_bub_ms, itype_id, int>> requirement_map;
1471  if( you.backlog.empty() || you.backlog.front().str_values.empty() ) {
1472  return requirement_map;
1473  }
1474  const requirement_data things_to_fetch = requirement_id( you.backlog.front().str_values[0] ).obj();
1475  const activity_id activity_to_restore = you.backlog.front().id();
1476  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(performance-unnecessary-copy-initialization)
1477  requirement_id things_to_fetch_id = things_to_fetch.id();
1478  std::vector<std::vector<item_comp>> req_comps = things_to_fetch.get_components();
1479  std::vector<std::vector<tool_comp>> tool_comps = things_to_fetch.get_tools();
1480  std::vector<std::vector<quality_requirement>> quality_comps = things_to_fetch.get_qualities();
1481  zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
1482  const bool pickup_task = you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_FARM ||
1483  you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_CHOP_PLANKS ||
1484  you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_BUTCHER ||
1485  you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_CHOP_TREES ||
1486  you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_VEHICLE_DECONSTRUCTION ||
1487  you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_VEHICLE_REPAIR ||
1488  you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_FISH ||
1489  you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_MINE;
1490  // where it is, what it is, how much of it, and how much in total is required of that item.
1491  std::vector<std::tuple<tripoint_bub_ms, itype_id, int>> final_map;
1492  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> loot_spots;
1493  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> already_there_spots;
1494  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> combined_spots;
1495  std::map<itype_id, int> total_map;
1496  map &here = get_map();
1497  tripoint_bub_ms src_loc = here.bub_from_abs( you.backlog.front().placement );
1498  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &elem : here.points_in_radius( src_loc,
1499  PICKUP_RANGE - 1 ) ) {
1500  already_there_spots.push_back( elem );
1501  combined_spots.push_back( elem );
1502  }
1503  // TODO: fix point types
1504  for( const tripoint &elem : mgr.get_point_set_loot(
1505  you.get_location(), distance, you.is_npc(), _fac_id( you ) ) ) {
1506  // if there is a loot zone that's already near the work spot, we don't want it to be added twice.
1507  if( std::find( already_there_spots.begin(), already_there_spots.end(),
1508  // TODO: fix point types
1509  tripoint_bub_ms( elem ) ) != already_there_spots.end() ) {
1510  // construction tasks don't need the loot spot *and* the already_there/combined spots both added.
1511  // but a farming task will need to go and fetch the tool no matter if its near the work spot.
1512  // whereas the construction will automatically use what's nearby anyway.
1513  if( pickup_task ) {
1514  loot_spots.emplace_back( elem );
1515  } else {
1516  continue;
1517  }
1518  } else {
1519  loot_spots.emplace_back( elem );
1520  combined_spots.emplace_back( elem );
1521  }
1522  }
1523  add_basecamp_storage_to_loot_zone_list( mgr, src_loc, you, loot_spots, combined_spots );
1524  // if the requirements aren't available, then stop.
1525  if( !are_requirements_nearby( pickup_task ? loot_spots : combined_spots, things_to_fetch_id, you,
1526  activity_to_restore, pickup_task, src_loc ) ) {
1527  return requirement_map;
1528  }
1529  // if the requirements are already near the work spot and its a construction/crafting task, then no need to fetch anything more.
1530  if( !pickup_task &&
1531  are_requirements_nearby( already_there_spots, things_to_fetch_id, you, activity_to_restore,
1532  false, src_loc ) ) {
1533  return requirement_map;
1534  }
1535  // a vector of every item in every tile that matches any part of the requirements.
1536  // will be filtered for amounts/charges afterwards.
1537  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &point_elem : pickup_task ? loot_spots : combined_spots ) {
1538  std::map<itype_id, int> temp_map;
1539  for( const item &stack_elem : here.i_at( point_elem ) ) {
1540  for( std::vector<item_comp> &elem : req_comps ) {
1541  for( item_comp &comp_elem : elem ) {
1542  if( comp_elem.type == stack_elem.typeId() ) {
1543  // if its near the work site, we can remove a count from the requirements.
1544  // if two "lines" of the requirement have the same component appearing again
1545  // that is fine, we will choose which "line" to fulfill later, and the decrement will count towards that then.
1546  if( !pickup_task &&
1547  std::find( already_there_spots.begin(), already_there_spots.end(),
1548  point_elem ) != already_there_spots.end() ) {
1549  comp_elem.count -= stack_elem.count();
1550  }
1551  temp_map[stack_elem.typeId()] += stack_elem.count();
1552  }
1553  }
1554  }
1555  for( std::vector<tool_comp> &elem : tool_comps ) {
1556  for( tool_comp &comp_elem : elem ) {
1557  if( comp_elem.type == stack_elem.typeId() ) {
1558  if( !pickup_task &&
1559  std::find( already_there_spots.begin(), already_there_spots.end(),
1560  point_elem ) != already_there_spots.end() ) {
1561  comp_elem.count -= stack_elem.count();
1562  }
1563  if( comp_elem.by_charges() ) {
1564  // we don't care if there are 10 welders with 5 charges each
1565  // we only want the one welder that has the required charge.
1566  if( stack_elem.ammo_remaining( &you ) >= comp_elem.count ) {
1567  temp_map[stack_elem.typeId()] += stack_elem.ammo_remaining( &you );
1568  }
1569  } else {
1570  temp_map[stack_elem.typeId()] += stack_elem.count();
1571  }
1572  }
1573  }
1574  }
1575 
1576  for( std::vector<quality_requirement> &elem : quality_comps ) {
1577  for( quality_requirement &comp_elem : elem ) {
1578  const quality_id tool_qual = comp_elem.type;
1579  const int qual_level = comp_elem.level;
1580  if( stack_elem.has_quality( tool_qual, qual_level ) ) {
1581  if( !pickup_task &&
1582  std::find( already_there_spots.begin(), already_there_spots.end(),
1583  point_elem ) != already_there_spots.end() ) {
1584  comp_elem.count -= stack_elem.count();
1585  }
1586  temp_map[stack_elem.typeId()] += stack_elem.count();
1587  }
1588  }
1589  }
1590  }
1591  for( const auto &map_elem : temp_map ) {
1592  total_map[map_elem.first] += map_elem.second;
1593  // if its a construction/crafting task, we can discount any items already near the work spot.
1594  // we don't need to fetch those, they will be used automatically in the construction.
1595  // a shovel for tilling, for example, however, needs to be picked up, no matter if its near the spot or not.
1596  if( !pickup_task ) {
1597  if( std::find( already_there_spots.begin(), already_there_spots.end(),
1598  point_elem ) != already_there_spots.end() ) {
1599  continue;
1600  }
1601  }
1602  requirement_map.emplace_back( point_elem, map_elem.first, map_elem.second );
1603  }
1604  }
1605  // Ok we now have a list of all the items that match the requirements, their points, and a quantity for each one.
1606  // we need to consolidate them, and winnow it down to the minimum required counts, instead of all matching.
1607  for( const std::vector<item_comp> &elem : req_comps ) {
1608  bool line_found = false;
1609  for( const item_comp &comp_elem : elem ) {
1610  if( line_found || comp_elem.count <= 0 ) {
1611  break;
1612  }
1613  int quantity_required = comp_elem.count;
1614  int item_quantity = 0;
1615  auto it = requirement_map.begin();
1616  int remainder = 0;
1617  while( it != requirement_map.end() ) {
1618  tripoint_bub_ms pos_here = std::get<0>( *it );
1619  itype_id item_here = std::get<1>( *it );
1620  int quantity_here = std::get<2>( *it );
1621  if( comp_elem.type == item_here ) {
1622  item_quantity += quantity_here;
1623  }
1624  if( item_quantity >= quantity_required ) {
1625  // it's just this spot that can fulfil the requirement on its own
1626  final_map.emplace_back( pos_here, item_here, std::min<int>( quantity_here,
1627  quantity_required ) );
1628  if( quantity_here >= quantity_required ) {
1629  line_found = true;
1630  break;
1631  } else {
1632  remainder = quantity_required - quantity_here;
1633  }
1634  break;
1635  }
1636  it++;
1637  }
1638  if( line_found ) {
1639  while( true ) {
1640  // go back over things
1641  if( it == requirement_map.begin() ) {
1642  break;
1643  }
1644  if( remainder <= 0 ) {
1645  line_found = true;
1646  break;
1647  }
1648  tripoint_bub_ms pos_here2 = std::get<0>( *it );
1649  itype_id item_here2 = std::get<1>( *it );
1650  int quantity_here2 = std::get<2>( *it );
1651  if( comp_elem.type == item_here2 ) {
1652  if( quantity_here2 >= remainder ) {
1653  final_map.emplace_back( pos_here2, item_here2, remainder );
1654  line_found = true;
1655  } else {
1656  final_map.emplace_back( pos_here2, item_here2, remainder );
1657  remainder -= quantity_here2;
1658  }
1659  }
1660  it--;
1661  }
1662  }
1663  }
1664  }
1665  for( const std::vector<tool_comp> &elem : tool_comps ) {
1666  bool line_found = false;
1667  for( const tool_comp &comp_elem : elem ) {
1668  if( line_found || comp_elem.count < -1 ) {
1669  break;
1670  }
1671  int quantity_required = std::max( 1, comp_elem.count );
1672  int item_quantity = 0;
1673  auto it = requirement_map.begin();
1674  int remainder = 0;
1675  while( it != requirement_map.end() ) {
1676  tripoint_bub_ms pos_here = std::get<0>( *it );
1677  itype_id item_here = std::get<1>( *it );
1678  int quantity_here = std::get<2>( *it );
1679  if( comp_elem.type == item_here ) {
1680  item_quantity += quantity_here;
1681  }
1682  if( item_quantity >= quantity_required ) {
1683  // it's just this spot that can fulfil the requirement on its own
1684  final_map.emplace_back( pos_here, item_here, std::min<int>( quantity_here,
1685  quantity_required ) );
1686  if( quantity_here >= quantity_required ) {
1687  line_found = true;
1688  break;
1689  } else {
1690  remainder = quantity_required - quantity_here;
1691  }
1692  break;
1693  }
1694  it++;
1695  }
1696  if( line_found ) {
1697  while( true ) {
1698  // go back over things
1699  if( it == requirement_map.begin() ) {
1700  break;
1701  }
1702  if( remainder <= 0 ) {
1703  line_found = true;
1704  break;
1705  }
1706  tripoint_bub_ms pos_here2 = std::get<0>( *it );
1707  itype_id item_here2 = std::get<1>( *it );
1708  int quantity_here2 = std::get<2>( *it );
1709  if( comp_elem.type == item_here2 ) {
1710  if( quantity_here2 >= remainder ) {
1711  final_map.emplace_back( pos_here2, item_here2, remainder );
1712  line_found = true;
1713  } else {
1714  final_map.emplace_back( pos_here2, item_here2, remainder );
1715  remainder -= quantity_here2;
1716  }
1717  }
1718  it--;
1719  }
1720  }
1721  }
1722  }
1723  for( const std::vector<quality_requirement> &elem : quality_comps ) {
1724  bool line_found = false;
1725  for( const quality_requirement &comp_elem : elem ) {
1726  if( line_found || comp_elem.count <= 0 ) {
1727  break;
1728  }
1729  const quality_id tool_qual = comp_elem.type;
1730  const int qual_level = comp_elem.level;
1731  for( auto it = requirement_map.begin(); it != requirement_map.end(); ) {
1732  tripoint_bub_ms pos_here = std::get<0>( *it );
1733  itype_id item_here = std::get<1>( *it );
1734  item test_item = item( item_here, calendar::turn_zero );
1735  if( test_item.has_quality( tool_qual, qual_level ) ) {
1736  // it's just this spot that can fulfil the requirement on its own
1737  final_map.emplace_back( pos_here, item_here, 1 );
1738  line_found = true;
1739  break;
1740  }
1741  it++;
1742  }
1743  }
1744  }
1745  for( const std::tuple<tripoint_bub_ms, itype_id, int> &elem : final_map ) {
1746  add_msg_debug( debugmode::DF_REQUIREMENTS_MAP, "%s is fetching %s from %s ",
1747  you.disp_name(),
1748  std::get<1>( elem ).str(), std::get<0>( elem ).to_string_writable() );
1749  }
1750  return final_map;
1751 }

1756 void _tidy_move_items( Character &you, item_stack &stack, tripoint_bub_ms const &src_loc,
1757  tripoint_bub_ms const &dst_loc, const std::optional<vpart_reference> &vpr_src,
1758  activity_id const &activity_to_restore )
1759 {
1760  for( item &it : stack ) {
1761  if( it.has_var( "activity_var" ) && it.get_var( "activity_var", "" ) == you.name ) {
1762  move_item( you, it, it.count(), src_loc, dst_loc, vpr_src, activity_to_restore );
1763  break;
1764  }
1765  }
1766 }

1770 static bool construction_activity( Character &you, const zone_data * /*zone*/,
1771  const tripoint_bub_ms &src_loc,
1772  const activity_reason_info &act_info,
1773  const activity_id &activity_to_restore )
1774 {
1775  // the actual desired construction
1776  if( !act_info.con_idx ) {
1777  debugmsg( "no construction selected" );
1778  return false;
1779  }
1780  const construction &built_chosen = act_info.con_idx->obj();
1781  std::list<item> used;
1782  // create the partial construction struct
1783  partial_con pc;
1784  pc.id = built_chosen.id;
1785  map &here = get_map();
1786  // Set the trap that has the examine function
1787  // Use up the components
1788  for( const std::vector<item_comp> &it : built_chosen.requirements->get_components() ) {
1789  for( const item_comp &comp : it ) {
1790  comp_selection<item_comp> sel;
1791  sel.use_from = usage_from::both;
1792  sel.comp = comp;
1793  std::list<item> consumed = you.consume_items( sel, 1, is_crafting_component );
1794  used.splice( used.end(), consumed );
1795  }
1796  }
1797  pc.components = used;
1798  // TODO: fix point types
1799  here.partial_con_set( tripoint_bub_ms( src_loc ), pc );
1800  for( const std::vector<tool_comp> &it : built_chosen.requirements->get_tools() ) {
1801  you.consume_tools( it );
1802  }
1803  you.backlog.emplace_front( activity_to_restore );
1804  you.assign_activity( ACT_BUILD );
1805  you.activity.placement = here.getglobal( src_loc );
1806  return true;
1807 }
1808 
1809 static bool tidy_activity( Character &you, const tripoint_bub_ms &src_loc,
1810  const activity_id &activity_to_restore,
1811  const int distance = ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE )
1812 {
1813  zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
1814  map &here = get_map();
1815  tripoint_abs_ms loot_abspos = here.getglobal( src_loc );
1816  tripoint_bub_ms loot_src_lot;
1817  const auto &zone_src_set = mgr.get_near( zone_type_LOOT_UNSORTED, loot_abspos, distance, nullptr,
1818  _fac_id( you ) );
1819  if( !zone_src_set.empty() ) {
1820  const std::vector<tripoint_abs_ms> &zone_src_sorted = get_sorted_tiles_by_distance(
1821  loot_abspos, zone_src_set );
1822  // Find the nearest unsorted zone to dump objects at
1823  for( const tripoint_abs_ms &src_elem : zone_src_sorted ) {
1824  if( !here.can_put_items_ter_furn( here.getlocal( src_elem ) ) ) {
1825  continue;
1826  }
1827  loot_src_lot = here.bub_from_abs( src_elem );
1828  break;
1829  }
1830  }
1831  if( loot_src_lot == tripoint_bub_ms() ) {
1832  return false;
1833  }
1834  if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> ovp = here.veh_at( src_loc ).cargo() ) {
1835  vehicle_stack vs = ovp->items();
1836  _tidy_move_items( you, vs, src_loc, loot_src_lot, ovp, activity_to_restore );
1837  }
1838  map_stack stack = here.i_at( src_loc );
1839  _tidy_move_items( you, stack, src_loc, loot_src_lot, std::nullopt, activity_to_restore );
1840 
1841  // we are adjacent to an unsorted zone, we came here to just drop items we are carrying
1842  if( mgr.has( zone_type_LOOT_UNSORTED, here.getglobal( src_loc ), _fac_id( you ) ) ) {
1843  for( item *inv_elem : you.inv_dump() ) {
1844  if( inv_elem->has_var( "activity_var" ) ) {
1845  inv_elem->erase_var( "activity_var" );
1846  put_into_vehicle_or_drop( you, item_drop_reason::deliberate, { *inv_elem }, src_loc );
1847  you.i_rem( inv_elem );
1848  }
1849  }
1850  }
1851  return true;
1852 }
1853 
1854 static bool fetch_activity(
1855  Character &you, const tripoint_bub_ms &src_loc, const activity_id &activity_to_restore,
1856  const int distance = ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE )
1857 {
1858  map &here = get_map();
1859  if( !here.can_put_items_ter_furn( here.getlocal( you.backlog.front().coords.back() ) ) ) {
1860  return false;
1861  }
1862  const std::vector<std::tuple<tripoint_bub_ms, itype_id, int>> mental_map_2 =
1863  requirements_map( you, distance );
1864  int pickup_count = 1;
1865  map_stack items_there = here.i_at( src_loc );
1866  const units::volume volume_allowed = you.volume_capacity() - you.volume_carried();
1867  const units::mass weight_allowed = you.weight_capacity() - you.weight_carried();
1868  const std::optional<vpart_reference> ovp = here.veh_at( src_loc ).cargo();
1869  if( ovp ) {
1870  for( item &veh_elem : ovp->items() ) {
1871  for( auto elem : mental_map_2 ) {
1872  if( std::get<0>( elem ) == src_loc && veh_elem.typeId() == std::get<1>( elem ) ) {
1873  if( !you.backlog.empty() && you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_CONSTRUCTION ) {
1874  move_item( you, veh_elem, veh_elem.count_by_charges() ? std::get<2>( elem ) : 1, src_loc,
1875  here.bub_from_abs( you.backlog.front().coords.back() ), ovp, activity_to_restore );
1876  return true;
1877  }
1878  }
1879  }
1880  }
1881  }
1882  for( auto item_iter = items_there.begin(); item_iter != items_there.end(); item_iter++ ) {
1883  item &it = *item_iter;
1884  for( auto elem : mental_map_2 ) {
1885  if( std::get<0>( elem ) == src_loc && it.typeId() == std::get<1>( elem ) ) {
1886  // construction/crafting tasks want the required item moved near the work spot.
1887  if( !you.backlog.empty() && ( you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_CONSTRUCTION ||
1888  you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_DIS ) ) {
1889  move_item( you, it, it.count_by_charges() ? std::get<2>( elem ) : 1, src_loc,
1890  here.bub_from_abs( you.backlog.front().coords.back() ), ovp, activity_to_restore );
1891 
1892  return true;
1893  // other tasks want the tool picked up
1894  } else if( !you.backlog.empty() && ( you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_FARM ||
1895  you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_CHOP_PLANKS ||
1896  you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_VEHICLE_DECONSTRUCTION ||
1897  you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_VEHICLE_REPAIR ||
1898  you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_BUTCHER ||
1899  you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_CHOP_TREES ||
1900  you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_FISH ||
1901  you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_MINE ||
1902  you.backlog.front().id() == ACT_MULTIPLE_MOP ) ) {
1903  if( it.volume() > volume_allowed || it.weight() > weight_allowed ) {
1904  add_msg_if_player_sees( you, _( "%1s failed to fetch tools." ), you.name );
1905  continue;
1906  }
1907  item leftovers = it;
1908  if( pickup_count != 1 && it.count_by_charges() ) {
1909  // Reinserting leftovers happens after item removal to avoid stacking issues.
1910  leftovers.charges = it.charges - pickup_count;
1911  if( leftovers.charges > 0 ) {
1912  it.charges = pickup_count;
1913  }
1914  } else {
1915  leftovers.charges = 0;
1916  }
1917  it.set_var( "activity_var", you.name );
1918  you.i_add( it );
1919  if( you.is_npc() ) {
1920  if( pickup_count == 1 ) {
1921  const std::string item_name = it.tname();
1922  add_msg( _( "%1$s picks up a %2$s." ), you.disp_name(), item_name );
1923  } else {
1924  add_msg( _( "%s picks up several items." ), you.disp_name() );
1925  }
1926  }
1927  items_there.erase( item_iter );
1928  // If we didn't pick up a whole stack, put the remainder back where it came from.
1929  if( leftovers.charges > 0 ) {
1930  here.add_item_or_charges( src_loc, leftovers );
1931  }
1932  return true;
1933  }
1934  }
1935  }
1936  }
1937  // if we got here, then the fetch failed for reasons that weren't predicted before setting it.
1938  // nothing was moved or picked up, and nothing can be moved or picked up
1939  // so call the whole thing off to stop it looping back to this point ad nauseum.
1940  you.set_moves( 0 );
1941  you.activity = player_activity();
1942  you.backlog.clear();
1943  return false;
1944 }
1945 
1946 static bool butcher_corpse_activity( Character &you, const tripoint_bub_ms &src_loc,
1947  const do_activity_reason &reason )
1948 {
1949  map &here = get_map();
1950  map_stack items = here.i_at( src_loc );
1951  for( item &elem : items ) {
1952  if( elem.is_corpse() && !elem.has_var( "activity_var" ) ) {
1953  const mtype corpse = *elem.get_mtype();
1954  if( corpse.size >= creature_size::medium && reason != do_activity_reason::NEEDS_BIG_BUTCHERING ) {
1955  continue;
1956  }
1957  elem.set_var( "activity_var", you.name );
1958  you.assign_activity( ACT_BUTCHER_FULL, 0, true );
1959  // TODO: fix point types
1960  you.activity.targets.emplace_back( map_cursor( src_loc.raw() ), &elem );
1961  you.activity.placement = here.getglobal( src_loc );
1962  return true;
1963  }
1964  }
1965  return false;
1966 }
