1968 static bool chop_plank_activity( Character &you, const tripoint_bub_ms &src_loc )
1969 {
1970  item &best_qual = you.best_item_with_quality( qual_AXE );
1971  if( best_qual.is_null() ) {
1972  return false;
1973  }
1974  if( best_qual.type->can_have_charges() ) {
1975  you.consume_charges( best_qual, best_qual.type->charges_to_use() );
1976  }
1977  map &here = get_map();
1978  for( item &i : here.i_at( src_loc ) ) {
1979  if( i.typeId() == itype_log ) {
1980  here.i_rem( src_loc, &i );
1981  int moves = to_moves<int>( 20_minutes );
1982  you.add_msg_if_player( _( "You cut the log into planks." ) );
1983  you.assign_activity( chop_planks_activity_actor( moves ) );
1984  you.activity.placement = here.getglobal( src_loc );
1985  return true;
1986  }
1987  }
1988  return false;
1989 }
1990 
1991 void activity_on_turn_move_loot( player_activity &act, Character &you )
1992 {
1993  enum activity_stage : int {
1994  //Initial stage
1995  INIT = 0,
1996  //Think about what to do first: choose destination
1997  THINK,
1998  //Do activity
1999  DO,
2000  };
2001 
2002  int &stage = act.index;
2003  //Prepare activity stage
2004  if( stage < 0 ) {
2005  stage = INIT;
2006  //num_processed
2007  act.values.push_back( 0 );
2008  }
2009  int &num_processed = act.values[ 0 ];
2010 
2011  map &here = get_map();
2012  const tripoint_abs_ms abspos = you.get_location();
2013  zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
2014  if( here.check_vehicle_zones( here.get_abs_sub().z() ) ) {
2015  mgr.cache_vzones();
2016  }
2017 
2018  if( stage == INIT ) {
2019  // TODO: fix point types
2020  act.coord_set.clear();
2021  for( const tripoint_abs_ms &p :
2022  mgr.get_near( zone_type_LOOT_UNSORTED, abspos, ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE, nullptr,
2023  _fac_id( you ) ) ) {
2024  act.coord_set.insert( p.raw() );
2025  }
2026  stage = THINK;
2027  }
2028 
2029  if( stage == THINK ) {
2030  //initialize num_processed
2031  num_processed = 0;
2032  // TODO: fix point types
2033  std::vector<tripoint_abs_ms> src_set;
2034  src_set.reserve( act.coord_set.size() );
2035  for( const tripoint &p : act.coord_set ) {
2036  src_set.emplace_back( p );
2037  }
2038  // sort source tiles by distance
2039  const auto &src_sorted = get_sorted_tiles_by_distance( abspos, src_set );
2040 
2041  for( const tripoint_abs_ms &src : src_sorted ) {
2042  act.placement = src;
2043  // TODO: fix point types
2044  act.coord_set.erase( src.raw() );
2045 
2046  const tripoint_bub_ms src_loc = here.bub_from_abs( src );
2047  if( !here.inbounds( src_loc ) ) {
2048  if( !here.inbounds( you.pos() ) ) {
2049  // p is implicitly an NPC that has been moved off the map, so reset the activity
2050  // and unload them
2051  you.cancel_activity();
2052  you.assign_activity( ACT_MOVE_LOOT );
2053  you.set_moves( 0 );
2054  g->reload_npcs();
2055  return;
2056  }
2057  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> route;
2058  route = here.route( you.pos_bub(), src_loc, you.get_pathfinding_settings(),
2059  you.get_path_avoid() );
2060  if( route.empty() ) {
2061  // can't get there, can't do anything, skip it
2062  continue;
2063  }
2064  stage = DO;
2065  you.set_destination( route, act );
2066  you.activity.set_to_null();
2067  return;
2068  }
2069 
2070  std::vector<zone_data const *> zones;
2071  bool ignore_contents = false;
2072 
2073  // check ignorable zones for ignore_contents enabled
2074  for( const auto &zone_type : ignorable_zone_types ) {
2075  // add zones using mgr.get_zones_at
2076  for( zone_data const *zone : mgr.get_zones_at( src, zone_type, _fac_id( you ) ) ) {
2077  ignorable_options const &options = dynamic_cast<const ignorable_options &>( zone->get_options() );
2078  if( options.get_ignore_contents() ) {
2079  ignore_contents = true;
2080  break;
2081  }
2082  }
2083  if( ignore_contents ) {
2084  break;
2085  }
2086  }
2087 
2088 
2089  // skip tiles in IGNORE zone or with ignore option,
2090  // tiles on fire (to prevent taking out wood off the lit brazier)
2091  // and inaccessible furniture, like filled charcoal kiln
2092  if( mgr.has( zone_type_LOOT_IGNORE, src, _fac_id( you ) ) ||
2093  ignore_contents ||
2094  here.get_field( src_loc, fd_fire ) != nullptr ||
2095  !here.can_put_items_ter_furn( src_loc ) ) {
2096  continue;
2097  }
2098 
2099  //nothing to sort?
2100  const std::optional<vpart_reference> vp = here.veh_at( src_loc ).cargo();
2101  if( ( !vp || vp->items().empty() ) && here.i_at( src_loc ).empty() ) {
2102  continue;
2103  }
2104 
2105  bool is_adjacent_or_closer = square_dist( you.pos_bub(), src_loc ) <= 1;
2106  // before we move any item, check if player is at or
2107  // adjacent to the loot source tile
2108  if( !is_adjacent_or_closer ) {
2109  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> route;
2110  bool adjacent = false;
2111 
2112  // get either direct route or route to nearest adjacent tile if
2113  // source tile is impassable
2114  if( here.passable( src_loc ) ) {
2115  route = here.route( you.pos_bub(), src_loc, you.get_pathfinding_settings(),
2116  you.get_path_avoid() );
2117  } else {
2118  // impassable source tile (locker etc.),
2119  // get route to nearest adjacent tile instead
2120  route = route_adjacent( you, src_loc );
2121  adjacent = true;
2122  }
2123 
2124  // check if we found path to source / adjacent tile
2125  if( route.empty() ) {
2126  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s can't reach the source tile. Try to sort out loot without a cart." ),
2127  you.disp_name() );
2128  continue;
2129  }
2130 
2131  // shorten the route to adjacent tile, if necessary
2132  if( !adjacent ) {
2133  route.pop_back();
2134  }
2135 
2136  // set the destination and restart activity after player arrives there
2137  // we don't need to check for safe mode,
2138  // activity will be restarted only if
2139  // player arrives on destination tile
2140  stage = DO;
2141  you.set_destination( route, act );
2142  you.activity.set_to_null();
2143  return;
2144  }
2145  stage = DO;
2146  break;
2147  }
2148  }
2149  if( stage == DO ) {
2150  // TODO: fix point types
2151  const tripoint_abs_ms src( act.placement );
2152  const tripoint_bub_ms src_loc = here.bub_from_abs( src );
2153 
2154  bool is_adjacent_or_closer = square_dist( you.pos_bub(), src_loc ) <= 1;
2155  // before we move any item, check if player is at or
2156  // adjacent to the loot source tile
2157  if( !is_adjacent_or_closer ) {
2158  stage = THINK;
2159  return;
2160  }
2161 
2162  // the boolean in this pair being true indicates the item is from a vehicle storage space
2163  auto items = std::vector<std::pair<item *, bool>>();
2164  const std::optional<vpart_reference> vpr = here.veh_at( src_loc ).cargo();
2165  //Check source for cargo part
2166  //map_stack and vehicle_stack are different types but inherit from item_stack
2167  // TODO: use one for loop
2168  if( vpr ) {
2169  for( item &it : vpr->items() ) {
2170  items.emplace_back( &it, true );
2171  }
2172  }
2173  for( item &it : here.i_at( src_loc ) ) {
2174  items.emplace_back( &it, false );
2175  }
2176 
2177  bool unload_mods = false;
2178  bool unload_molle = false;
2179  bool unload_sparse_only = false;
2180  int unload_sparse_threshold = 20;
2181  bool unload_always = false;
2182 
2183  std::vector<zone_data const *> const zones = mgr.get_zones_at( src, zone_type_UNLOAD_ALL,
2184  _fac_id( you ) );
2185 
2186  // get most open rules out of all stacked zones
2187  for( zone_data const *zone : zones ) {
2188  unload_options const &options = dynamic_cast<const unload_options &>( zone->get_options() );
2189  unload_molle |= options.unload_molle();
2190  unload_mods |= options.unload_mods();
2191  unload_sparse_only |= options.unload_sparse_only();
2192  unload_sparse_threshold |= options.unload_sparse_threshold();
2193  unload_always |= options.unload_always();
2194  }
2195 
2196  //Skip items that have already been processed
2197  for( auto it = items.begin() + num_processed; it < items.end(); ++it ) {
2198  ++num_processed;
2199  item &thisitem = *it->first;
2200 
2201  // skip items not owned by you
2202  if( !thisitem.is_owned_by( you, true ) ) {
2203  continue;
2204  }
2205 
2206  // skip unpickable liquid
2207  if( !thisitem.made_of_from_type( phase_id::SOLID ) ) {
2208  continue;
2209  }
2210 
2211  // skip favorite items in ignore favorite zones
2212  if( thisitem.is_favorite && mgr.has( zone_type_LOOT_IGNORE_FAVORITES, src, _fac_id( you ) ) ) {
2213  continue;
2214  }
2215 
2216  // Only if it's from a vehicle do we use the vehicle source location information.
2217  const std::optional<vpart_reference> vpr_src = it->second ? vpr : std::nullopt;
2218  const zone_type_id id = mgr.get_near_zone_type_for_item( thisitem, abspos,
2219  ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE, _fac_id( you ) );
2220 
2221  // checks whether the item is already on correct loot zone or not
2222  // if it is, we can skip such item, if not we move the item to correct pile
2223  // think empty bag on food pile, after you ate the content
2224  if( id != zone_type_LOOT_CUSTOM && mgr.has( id, src, _fac_id( you ) ) ) {
2225  continue;
2226  }
2227 
2228  if( id == zone_type_LOOT_CUSTOM &&
2229  mgr.custom_loot_has( src, &thisitem, zone_type_LOOT_CUSTOM, _fac_id( you ) ) ) {
2230  continue;
2231  }
2232 
2233  const std::unordered_set<tripoint_abs_ms> dest_set =
2234  mgr.get_near( id, abspos, ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE, &thisitem, _fac_id( you ) );
2235 
2236  // if this item isn't going anywhere and its not sealed
2237  // check if it is in a unload zone or a strip corpse zone
2238  // then we should unload it and see what is inside
2239  bool move_and_reset = false;
2240  bool moved_something = false;
2241 
2242  if( mgr.has_near( zone_type_UNLOAD_ALL, abspos, 1, _fac_id( you ) ) ||
2243  ( mgr.has_near( zone_type_STRIP_CORPSES, abspos, 1, _fac_id( you ) ) && it->first->is_corpse() ) ) {
2244  if( dest_set.empty() || unload_always ) {
2245  if( you.rate_action_unload( *it->first ) == hint_rating::good &&
2246  !it->first->any_pockets_sealed() ) {
2247  std::unordered_map<itype_id, int> item_counts;
2248  if( unload_sparse_only ) {
2249  for( item *contained : it->first->all_items_top( pocket_type::CONTAINER ) ) {
2250  if( !contained->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) && !contained->made_of( phase_id::GAS ) ) {
2251  item_counts[contained->typeId()]++;
2252  }
2253  }
2254  }
2255  for( item *contained : it->first->all_items_top( pocket_type::CONTAINER ) ) {
2256  // no liquids don't want to spill stuff
2257  if( !contained->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) && !contained->made_of( phase_id::GAS ) ) {
2258  if( unload_sparse_only &&
2259  item_counts[contained->typeId()] > unload_sparse_threshold ) {
2260  continue;
2261  }
2262  move_item( you, *contained, contained->count(), src_loc, src_loc, vpr_src );
2263  it->first->remove_item( *contained );
2264  }
2265  }
2266  for( item *contained : it->first->all_items_top( pocket_type::MAGAZINE ) ) {
2267  // no liquids don't want to spill stuff
2268  if( !contained->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) && !contained->made_of( phase_id::GAS ) ) {
2269  if( it->first->is_ammo_belt() ) {
2270  if( it->first->type->magazine->linkage ) {
2271  item link( *it->first->type->magazine->linkage, calendar::turn, contained->count() );
2272  if( vpr_src ) {
2273  vpr_src->vehicle().add_item( vpr_src->part(), link );
2274  } else {
2275  here.add_item_or_charges( src_loc, link );
2276  }
2277  }
2278  }
2279  move_item( you, *contained, contained->count(), src_loc, src_loc, vpr_src );
2280  it->first->remove_item( *contained );
2281  }
2282  }
2283  for( item *contained : it->first->all_items_top( pocket_type::MAGAZINE_WELL ) ) {
2284  // no liquids don't want to spill stuff
2285  if( !contained->made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) && !contained->made_of( phase_id::GAS ) ) {
2286  move_item( you, *contained, contained->count(), src_loc, src_loc, vpr_src );
2287  it->first->remove_item( *contained );
2288  }
2289  }
2290  moved_something = true;
2291 
2292  }
2293 
2294  // if unloading mods
2295  if( unload_mods ) {
2296  // remove each mod, skip irremovable
2297  for( item *mod : it->first->gunmods() ) {
2298  if( mod->is_irremovable() ) {
2299  continue;
2300  }
2301  you.gunmod_remove( *it->first, *mod );
2302  // need to return so the activity starts
2303  return;
2304  }
2305  }
2306 
2307  // if unloading molle
2308  if( unload_molle ) {
2309  while( !it->first->get_contents().get_added_pockets().empty() ) {
2310  item removed = it->first->get_contents().remove_pocket( 0 );
2311  move_item( you, removed, 1, src_loc, src_loc, vpr_src );
2312  moved_something = true;
2313  }
2314  }
2315  if( it->first->has_flag( flag_MAG_DESTROY ) && it->first->ammo_remaining() == 0 ) {
2316  if( vpr_src ) {
2317  vpr_src->vehicle().remove_item( vpr_src->part(), it->first );
2318  } else {
2319  here.i_rem( src_loc, it->first );
2320  }
2321  num_processed = std::max( num_processed - 1, 0 );
2322  return;
2323  }
2324 
2325  // after dumping items go back to start of activity loop
2326  // so that can re-assess the items in the tile
2327  // perhaps move the last item first however
2328  if( unload_always && moved_something ) {
2329  move_and_reset = true;
2330  } else if( moved_something ) {
2331  return;
2332  }
2333 
2334  }
2335 
2336  }
2337 
2338  for( const tripoint_abs_ms &dest : dest_set ) {
2339  const tripoint_bub_ms dest_loc = here.bub_from_abs( dest );
2340  units::volume free_space;
2341 
2342  //Check destination for cargo part
2343  if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> ovp = here.veh_at( dest_loc ).cargo() ) {
2344  free_space = ovp->items().free_volume();
2345  } else {
2346  free_space = here.free_volume( dest_loc );
2347  }
2348 
2349  // skip tiles with inaccessible furniture, like filled charcoal kiln
2350  if( !here.can_put_items_ter_furn( dest_loc ) ||
2351  static_cast<int>( here.i_at( dest_loc ).size() ) >= MAX_ITEM_IN_SQUARE ) {
2352  continue;
2353  }
2354 
2355  // check free space at destination
2356  if( free_space >= thisitem.volume() ) {
2357  move_item( you, thisitem, thisitem.count(), src_loc, dest_loc, vpr_src );
2358 
2359  // moved item away from source so decrement
2360  if( num_processed > 0 ) {
2361  --num_processed;
2362  }
2363  break;
2364  }
2365  }
2366  if( you.get_moves() <= 0 || move_and_reset ) {
2367  return;
2368  }
2369  }
2370 
2371  //this location is sorted
2372  stage = THINK;
2373  return;
2374  }
2375 
2376  // If we got here without restarting the activity, it means we're done
2377  add_msg( m_info, _( "%s sorted out every item possible." ), you.disp_name( false, true ) );
2378  if( you.is_npc() ) {
2379  npc *guy = dynamic_cast<npc *>( &you );
2380  guy->revert_after_activity();
2381  }
2382  you.activity.set_to_null();
2383 }
2384 
2385 static int chop_moves( Character &you, item &it )
2386 {
2387  // quality of tool
2388  const int quality = it.get_quality( qual_AXE );
2389 
2390  // attribute; regular tools - based on STR, powered tools - based on DEX
2391  const int attr = it.has_flag( flag_POWERED ) ? you.dex_cur : you.get_arm_str();
2392 
2393  int moves = to_moves<int>( time_duration::from_minutes( 60 - attr ) / std::pow( 2, quality - 1 ) );
2394  const int helpersize = you.get_num_crafting_helpers( 3 );
2395  moves *= ( 1.0f - ( helpersize / 10.0f ) );
2396  return moves;
2397 }
2398 
2399 static bool mine_activity( Character &you, const tripoint_bub_ms &src_loc )
2400 {
2401  std::vector<item *> mining_inv = you.items_with( [&you]( const item & itm ) {
2402  return ( itm.has_flag( flag_DIG_TOOL ) && !itm.type->can_use( "JACKHAMMER" ) ) ||
2403  ( itm.type->can_use( "JACKHAMMER" ) && itm.ammo_sufficient( &you ) );
2404  } );
2405  map &here = get_map();
2406  if( mining_inv.empty() || you.is_mounted() || you.is_underwater() || here.veh_at( src_loc ) ||
2407  !here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_MINEABLE, src_loc ) || you.has_effect( effect_incorporeal ) ) {
2408  return false;
2409  }
2410  item *chosen_item = nullptr;
2411  bool powered = false;
2412  // is it a pickaxe or jackhammer?
2413  for( item *elem : mining_inv ) {
2414  if( chosen_item == nullptr ) {
2415  chosen_item = elem;
2416  if( elem->type->can_use( "JACKHAMMER" ) ) {
2417  powered = true;
2418  }
2419  } else {
2420  // prioritise powered tools
2421  if( chosen_item->type->can_use( "PICKAXE" ) && elem->type->can_use( "JACKHAMMER" ) ) {
2422  chosen_item = elem;
2423  powered = true;
2424  break;
2425  }
2426  }
2427  }
2428  if( chosen_item == nullptr ) {
2429  return false;
2430  }
2431  int moves = to_moves<int>( powered ? 30_minutes : 20_minutes );
2432  if( !powered ) {
2433  moves += ( ( MAX_STAT + 4 ) - std::min( you.get_arm_str(),
2434  MAX_STAT ) ) * to_moves<int>( 5_minutes );
2435  }
2436  if( here.move_cost( src_loc ) == 2 ) {
2437  // We're breaking up some flat surface like pavement, which is much easier
2438  moves /= 2;
2439  }
2440  you.assign_activity( powered ? ACT_JACKHAMMER : ACT_PICKAXE, moves );
2441  you.activity.targets.emplace_back( you, chosen_item );
2442  you.activity.placement = here.getglobal( src_loc );
2443  return true;
2444 
2445 }
2446 
2447 // Not really an activity like the others; relies on zone activity alerting on enemies
2448 static bool mop_activity( Character &you, const tripoint_bub_ms &src_loc )
2449 {
2450  // iuse::mop costs 15 moves per use
2451  you.assign_activity( mop_activity_actor( 15 ) );
2452  you.activity.placement = get_map().getglobal( src_loc );
2453  return true;
2454 }
2455 
2456 static bool chop_tree_activity( Character &you, const tripoint_bub_ms &src_loc )
2457 {
2458  item &best_qual = you.best_item_with_quality( qual_AXE );
2459  if( best_qual.is_null() ) {
2460  return false;
2461  }
2462  int moves = chop_moves( you, best_qual );
2463  if( best_qual.type->can_have_charges() ) {
2464  you.consume_charges( best_qual, best_qual.type->charges_to_use() );
2465  }
2466  map &here = get_map();
2467  const ter_id ter = here.ter( src_loc );
2468  if( here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_TREE, src_loc ) ) {
2469  you.assign_activity( chop_tree_activity_actor( moves, item_location( you, &best_qual ) ) );
2470  you.activity.placement = here.getglobal( src_loc );
2471  return true;
2472  } else if( ter == ter_t_trunk || ter == ter_t_stump ) {
2473  you.assign_activity( chop_logs_activity_actor( moves, item_location( you, &best_qual ) ) );
2474  you.activity.placement = here.getglobal( src_loc );
2475  return true;
2476  }
2477  return false;
2478 }

2480 static void check_npc_revert( Character &you )
2481 {
2482  if( you.is_npc() ) {
2483  npc *guy = dynamic_cast<npc *>( &you );
2484  if( guy ) {
2485  guy->revert_after_activity();
2486  }
2487  }
2488 }

2490 static zone_type_id get_zone_for_act( const tripoint_bub_ms &src_loc, const zone_manager &mgr,
2491  const activity_id &act_id, const faction_id &fac_id )
2492 {
2493  zone_type_id ret = zone_type_;
2494  if( act_id == ACT_VEHICLE_DECONSTRUCTION ) {
2495  ret = zone_type_VEHICLE_DECONSTRUCT;
2496  }
2497  if( act_id == ACT_VEHICLE_REPAIR ) {
2498  ret = zone_type_VEHICLE_REPAIR;
2499  }
2500  if( act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_CHOP_TREES ) {
2501  ret = zone_type_CHOP_TREES;
2502  }
2503  if( act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_CONSTRUCTION ) {
2504  ret = zone_type_CONSTRUCTION_BLUEPRINT;
2505  }
2506  if( act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_FARM ) {
2507  ret = zone_type_FARM_PLOT;
2508  }
2509  if( act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_BUTCHER ) {
2510  ret = zone_type_LOOT_CORPSE;
2511  }
2512  if( act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_CHOP_PLANKS ) {
2513  ret = zone_type_LOOT_WOOD;
2514  }
2515  if( act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_FISH ) {
2516  ret = zone_type_FISHING_SPOT;
2517  }
2518  if( act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_MINE ) {
2519  ret = zone_type_MINING;
2520  }
2521  if( act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_MOP ) {
2522  ret = zone_type_MOPPING;
2523  }
2524  if( act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_DIS ) {
2525  ret = zone_type_DISASSEMBLE;
2526  }
2527  if( src_loc != tripoint_bub_ms() && act_id == ACT_FETCH_REQUIRED ) {
2528  const zone_data *zd = mgr.get_zone_at( get_map().getglobal( src_loc ), false, fac_id );
2529  if( zd ) {
2530  ret = zd->get_type();
2531  }
2532  }
2533  return ret;
2534 }
2535 
2536 /** Determine all locations for this generic activity */
2537 /** Returns locations */
2538 static std::unordered_set<tripoint_abs_ms> generic_multi_activity_locations(
2539  Character &you, const activity_id &act_id )
2540 {
2541  bool dark_capable = false;
2542  std::unordered_set<tripoint_abs_ms> src_set;
2543 
2544  zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
2545  const tripoint_bub_ms localpos = you.pos_bub();
2546  map &here = get_map();
2547  const tripoint_abs_ms abspos = here.getglobal( localpos );
2548  if( act_id == ACT_TIDY_UP ) {
2549  dark_capable = true;
2550  tripoint unsorted_spot;
2551  std::unordered_set<tripoint_abs_ms> unsorted_set =
2552  mgr.get_near( zone_type_LOOT_UNSORTED, abspos, ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE, nullptr, _fac_id( you ) );
2553  if( !unsorted_set.empty() ) {
2554  unsorted_spot = here.getlocal( random_entry( unsorted_set ) );
2555  }
2556  bool found_one_point = false;
2557  bool found_route = true;
2558  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &elem : here.points_in_radius( localpos,
2559  ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE ) ) {
2560  // There's no point getting the entire list of all items to tidy up now.
2561  // the activity will run again after pathing to the first tile anyway.
2562  // tidy up activity has no requirements that will discount a square and
2563  // have the requirement to skip and scan the next one, ( other than checking path )
2564  // shortcircuiting the need to scan the entire map continuously can improve performance
2565  // especially if NPCs have a backlog of moves or there is a lot of them
2566  if( !found_route ) {
2567  found_route = true;
2568  continue;
2569  }
2570  if( found_one_point ) {
2571  break;
2572  }
2573  for( const item &stack_elem : here.i_at( elem ) ) {
2574  if( stack_elem.has_var( "activity_var" ) && stack_elem.get_var( "activity_var", "" ) == you.name ) {
2575  const furn_t &f = here.furn( elem ).obj();
2576  if( !f.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_PLANT ) ) {
2577  src_set.insert( here.getglobal( elem ) );
2578  found_one_point = true;
2579  // only check for a valid path, as that is all that is needed to tidy something up.
2580  if( square_dist( you.pos_bub(), elem ) > 1 ) {
2581  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> route = route_adjacent( you, elem );
2582  if( route.empty() ) {
2583  found_route = false;
2584  }
2585  }
2586  break;
2587  }
2588  }
2589  }
2590  }
2591  if( src_set.empty() && unsorted_spot != tripoint_zero ) {
2592  for( const item *inv_elem : you.inv_dump() ) {
2593  if( inv_elem->has_var( "activity_var" ) ) {
2594  // we've gone to tidy up all the things lying around, now tidy up the things we picked up.
2595  src_set.insert( here.getglobal( unsorted_spot ) );
2596  break;
2597  }
2598  }
2599  }
2600  } else if( act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_READ ) {
2601  // anywhere well lit
2602  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &elem : here.points_in_radius( localpos, ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE ) ) {
2603  src_set.insert( here.getglobal( elem ) );
2604  }
2605  } else if( act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_CRAFT ) {
2606  // Craft only with what is on the spot
2607  // TODO: add zone type like zone_type_CRAFT?
2608  src_set.insert( here.getglobal( localpos ) );
2609  } else if( act_id != ACT_FETCH_REQUIRED ) {
2610  zone_type_id zone_type = get_zone_for_act( tripoint_bub_ms{}, mgr, act_id, _fac_id( you ) );
2611  src_set = mgr.get_near( zone_type, abspos, ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE, nullptr, _fac_id( you ) );
2612  // multiple construction will form a list of targets based on blueprint zones and unfinished constructions
2613  if( act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_CONSTRUCTION ) {
2614  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &elem : here.points_in_radius( localpos, ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE ) ) {
2615  partial_con *pc = here.partial_con_at( elem );
2616  if( pc ) {
2617  src_set.insert( here.getglobal( elem ) );
2618  }
2619  }
2620  // farming activities encompass tilling, planting, harvesting.
2621  } else if( act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_FARM ) {
2622  dark_capable = true;
2623  }
2624  } else {
2625  dark_capable = true;
2626  // get the right zones for the items in the requirements.
2627  // we previously checked if the items are nearby before we set the fetch task
2628  // but we will check again later, to be sure nothings changed.
2629  std::vector<std::tuple<tripoint_bub_ms, itype_id, int>> mental_map =
2630  requirements_map( you, ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE );
2631  for( const auto &elem : mental_map ) {
2632  const tripoint_bub_ms &elem_point = std::get<0>( elem );
2633  src_set.insert( here.getglobal( elem_point ) );
2634  }
2635  }
2636  // prune the set to remove tiles that are never gonna work out.
2637  const bool pre_dark_check = src_set.empty();
2638  const bool MOP_ACTIVITY = act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_MOP;
2639  if( MOP_ACTIVITY ) {
2640  dark_capable = true;
2641  }
2642 
2643  for( auto it2 = src_set.begin(); it2 != src_set.end(); ) {
2644  // remove dangerous tiles
2645  const tripoint set_pt = here.getlocal( *it2 );
2646  if( MOP_ACTIVITY ) {
2647  if( !here.mopsafe_field_at( set_pt ) ) {
2648  it2 = src_set.erase( it2 );
2649  continue;
2650  }
2651  } else {
2652  if( here.dangerous_field_at( set_pt ) ) {
2653  it2 = src_set.erase( it2 );
2654  continue;
2655  }
2656  }
2657  // remove tiles in darkness, if we aren't lit-up ourselves
2658  if( !dark_capable && you.fine_detail_vision_mod( set_pt ) > 4.0 ) {
2659  it2 = src_set.erase( it2 );
2660  continue;
2661  }
2662  if( act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_FISH ) {
2663  const ter_id terrain_id = here.ter( set_pt );
2664  if( !terrain_id.obj().has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_DEEP_WATER ) ) {
2665  it2 = src_set.erase( it2 );
2666  } else {
2667  ++it2;
2668  }
2669  } else // Exclude activities that can't have multiple characters working on the same tile.
2670  if( act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_CHOP_TREES ||
2671  act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_CONSTRUCTION ||
2672  act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_MINE ) {
2673  bool skip = false;
2674 
2675  for( const npc &guy : g->all_npcs() ) {
2676  if( &guy == &you ) {
2677  continue;
2678  }
2679  if( guy.has_player_activity() && tripoint_abs_ms( guy.activity.placement ) == *it2 ) {
2680  it2 = src_set.erase( it2 );
2681  skip = true;
2682  break;
2683  }
2684  }
2685  if( skip ) {
2686  continue;
2687  } else {
2688  ++it2;
2689  }
2690  } else {
2691  ++it2;
2692  }
2693  }
2694  const bool post_dark_check = src_set.empty();
2695  if( !pre_dark_check && post_dark_check && !MOP_ACTIVITY ) {
2696  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "It is too dark to do the %s activity." ), act_id.c_str() );
2697  }
2698  return src_set;
2699 }
2700 
2701 /** Check if this activity can not be done immediately because it has some requirements */
2702 static requirement_check_result generic_multi_activity_check_requirement(
2703  Character &you, const activity_id &act_id, activity_reason_info &act_info,
2704  const tripoint_abs_ms &src, const tripoint_bub_ms &src_loc,
2705  const std::unordered_set<tripoint_abs_ms> &src_set, const bool check_only = false )
2706 {
2707  map &here = get_map();
2708  const tripoint_abs_ms abspos = here.getglobal( you.pos() );
2709  zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
2710 
2711  bool &can_do_it = act_info.can_do;
2712  const do_activity_reason &reason = act_info.reason;
2713  const zone_data *zone =
2714  mgr.get_zone_at( src, get_zone_for_act( src_loc, mgr, act_id, _fac_id( you ) ),
2715  _fac_id( you ) );
2716 
2717  const bool needs_to_be_in_zone = act_id == ACT_FETCH_REQUIRED ||
2718  act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_FARM ||
2719  act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_BUTCHER ||
2720  act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_CHOP_PLANKS ||
2721  act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_CHOP_TREES ||
2722  act_id == ACT_VEHICLE_DECONSTRUCTION ||
2723  act_id == ACT_VEHICLE_REPAIR ||
2724  act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_FISH ||
2725  act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_MINE ||
2726  act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_DIS ||
2727  ( act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_CONSTRUCTION &&
2728  // TODO: fix point types
2729  !here.partial_con_at( tripoint_bub_ms( src_loc ) ) );
2730  // some activities require the target tile to be part of a zone.
2731  // tidy up activity doesn't - it wants things that may not be in a zone already - things that may have been left lying around.
2732  if( needs_to_be_in_zone && !zone ) {
2733  can_do_it = false;
2734  return requirement_check_result::SKIP_LOCATION;
2735  }
2736  if( can_do_it ) {
2737  return requirement_check_result::CAN_DO_LOCATION;
2738  }
2739  if( reason == do_activity_reason::DONT_HAVE_SKILL ||
2740  reason == do_activity_reason::NO_ZONE ||
2741  reason == do_activity_reason::ALREADY_DONE ||
2742  reason == do_activity_reason::BLOCKING_TILE ||
2743  reason == do_activity_reason::UNKNOWN_ACTIVITY ) {
2744  // we can discount this tile, the work can't be done.
2745  if( reason == do_activity_reason::DONT_HAVE_SKILL ) {
2746  if( zone ) {
2747  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't have the skill for the %s task at zone %s." ),
2748  act_id.c_str(), zone->get_name() );
2749  } else {
2750  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "You don't have the skill for the %s task." ), act_id.c_str() );
2751  }
2752  } else if( reason == do_activity_reason::BLOCKING_TILE ) {
2753  if( zone ) {
2754  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info,
2755  _( "There is something blocking the location for the %s task at zone %s." ), act_id.c_str(),
2756  zone->get_name() );
2757  } else {
2758  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "There is something blocking the location for the %s task." ),
2759  act_id.c_str() );
2760  }
2761  }
2762  return requirement_check_result::SKIP_LOCATION;
2763  } else if( reason == do_activity_reason::NO_COMPONENTS ||
2764  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CUT_HARVESTING ||
2765  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_PLANTING ||
2766  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_TILLING ||
2767  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CHOPPING ||
2768  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_BUTCHERING ||
2769  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_BIG_BUTCHERING ||
2770  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_VEH_DECONST ||
2771  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_VEH_REPAIR ||
2772  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_TREE_CHOPPING ||
2773  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_FISHING || reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_MINING ||
2774  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CRAFT ||
2775  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_DISASSEMBLE ) {
2776  // we can do it, but we need to fetch some stuff first
2777  // before we set the task to fetch components - is it even worth it? are the components anywhere?
2778  if( you.is_npc() ) {
2779  if( zone ) {
2780  add_msg_if_player_sees( you, m_info,
2781  _( "%s is trying to find necessary items to do the %s job on zone %s, reason %s" ),
2782  you.disp_name(), act_id.c_str(), zone->get_name(), do_activity_reason_string[int( reason )] );
2783  } else {
2784  add_msg_if_player_sees( you, m_info,
2785  _( "%s is trying to find necessary items to do the %s job, reason %s" ),
2786  you.disp_name(), act_id.c_str(), do_activity_reason_string[int( reason )] );
2787  }
2788  }
2789  requirement_id what_we_need;
2790  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> loot_zone_spots;
2791  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> combined_spots;
2792  // TODO: fix point types
2793  for( const tripoint &elem : mgr.get_point_set_loot(
2794  abspos, ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE, you.is_npc(), _fac_id( you ) ) ) {
2795  loot_zone_spots.emplace_back( elem );
2796  combined_spots.emplace_back( elem );
2797  }
2798  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &elem : here.points_in_radius( src_loc, PICKUP_RANGE - 1,
2799  PICKUP_RANGE - 1 ) ) {
2800  combined_spots.push_back( elem );
2801  }
2802  add_basecamp_storage_to_loot_zone_list( mgr, src_loc, you, loot_zone_spots, combined_spots );
2803 
2804  if( reason == do_activity_reason::NO_COMPONENTS && act_id == ACT_MULTIPLE_CONSTRUCTION ) {
2805  if( !act_info.con_idx ) {
2806  debugmsg( "no construction selected" );
2807  return requirement_check_result::SKIP_LOCATION;
2808  }
2809  // its a construction and we need the components.
2810  const construction &built_chosen = act_info.con_idx->obj();
2811  what_we_need = built_chosen.requirements;
2812  } else if( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_VEH_DECONST ||
2813  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_VEH_REPAIR ) {
2814  const vehicle *veh = veh_pointer_or_null( here.veh_at( src_loc ) );
2815  // we already checked this in can_do_activity() but check again just incase.
2816  if( !veh ) {
2817  you.activity_vehicle_part_index = 1;
2818  return requirement_check_result::SKIP_LOCATION;
2819  }
2820  requirement_data reqs;
2821  if( you.activity_vehicle_part_index >= 0 &&
2822  you.activity_vehicle_part_index < static_cast<int>( veh->part_count() ) ) {
2823  const vpart_info &vpi = veh->part( you.activity_vehicle_part_index ).info();
2824  if( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_VEH_DECONST ) {
2825  reqs = vpi.removal_requirements();
2826  } else if( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_VEH_REPAIR ) {
2827  reqs = vpi.repair_requirements();
2828  }
2829  }
2830  const requirement_id req_id( std::to_string( reqs.make_hash() ) );
2831  if( requirement_data::all().count( req_id ) == 0 ) {
2832  requirement_data::save_requirement( reqs, req_id );
2833  }
2834  what_we_need = req_id;
2835  } else if( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_MINING ) {
2836  what_we_need = requirement_data_mining_standard;
2837  } else if( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_TILLING ||
2838  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_PLANTING ||
2839  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CHOPPING ||
2840  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CUT_HARVESTING ||
2841  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_BUTCHERING ||
2842  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_BIG_BUTCHERING ||
2843  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_TREE_CHOPPING ||
2844  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_FISHING ||
2845  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CRAFT ||
2846  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_DISASSEMBLE ) {
2847  std::vector<std::vector<item_comp>> requirement_comp_vector;
2848  std::vector<std::vector<quality_requirement>> quality_comp_vector;
2849  std::vector<std::vector<tool_comp>> tool_comp_vector;
2850  if( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_TILLING ) {
2851  quality_comp_vector.push_back( std::vector<quality_requirement> { quality_requirement( qual_DIG, 1, 1 ) } );
2852  } else if( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CHOPPING ||
2853  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_TREE_CHOPPING ) {
2854  quality_comp_vector.push_back( std::vector<quality_requirement> { quality_requirement( qual_AXE, 1, 1 ) } );
2855  } else if( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_PLANTING ) {
2856  requirement_comp_vector.push_back( std::vector<item_comp> { item_comp( itype_id( dynamic_cast<const plot_options &>
2857  ( zone->get_options() ).get_seed() ), 1 )
2858  } );
2859  } else if( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CUT_HARVESTING ) {
2860  quality_comp_vector.push_back( std::vector<quality_requirement> { quality_requirement( qual_GRASS_CUT, 1, 1 ) } );
2861  } else if( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_BUTCHERING ||
2862  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_BIG_BUTCHERING ) {
2863  quality_comp_vector.push_back( std::vector<quality_requirement> { quality_requirement( qual_BUTCHER, 1, 1 ) } );
2864  if( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_BIG_BUTCHERING ) {
2865  quality_comp_vector.push_back( std::vector<quality_requirement> { quality_requirement( qual_SAW_M, 1, 1 ), quality_requirement( qual_SAW_W, 1, 1 ) } );
2866  }
2867 
2868  } else if( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_FISHING ) {
2869  quality_comp_vector.push_back( std::vector<quality_requirement> {quality_requirement( qual_FISHING_ROD, 1, 1 )} );
2870  } else if( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CRAFT ) {
2871  requirement_comp_vector = act_info.req.get_components();
2872  quality_comp_vector = act_info.req.get_qualities();
2873  tool_comp_vector = act_info.req.get_tools();
2874  } else if( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_DISASSEMBLE ) {
2875  quality_comp_vector = act_info.req.get_qualities();
2876  tool_comp_vector = act_info.req.get_tools();
2877  }
2878  // ok, we need a shovel/hoe/axe/etc.
2879  // this is an activity that only requires this one tool, so we will fetch and wield it.
2880  requirement_data reqs_data = requirement_data( tool_comp_vector, quality_comp_vector,
2881  requirement_comp_vector );
2882  const requirement_id req_id( std::to_string( reqs_data.make_hash() ) );
2883  if( requirement_data::all().count( req_id ) == 0 ) {
2884  requirement_data::save_requirement( reqs_data, req_id );
2885  }
2886  what_we_need = req_id;
2887  }
2888  bool tool_pickup = reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_TILLING ||
2889  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_PLANTING ||
2890  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CHOPPING ||
2891  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CUT_HARVESTING ||
2892  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_BUTCHERING ||
2893  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_BIG_BUTCHERING ||
2894  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_TREE_CHOPPING ||
2895  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_VEH_DECONST ||
2896  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_VEH_REPAIR ||
2897  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_MINING;
2898  // is it even worth fetching anything if there isn't enough nearby?
2899  if( !are_requirements_nearby( tool_pickup ? loot_zone_spots : combined_spots, what_we_need, you,
2900  act_id, tool_pickup, src_loc ) ) {
2901  if( zone ) {
2902  you.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
2903  _( "The required items are not available to complete the %s task at zone %s." ), act_id.c_str(),
2904  zone->get_name(),
2905  _( "The required items are not available to complete the %s task at zone %s." ), act_id.c_str(),
2906  zone->get_name() );
2907  } else {
2908  you.add_msg_player_or_npc( m_info,
2909  _( "The required items are not available to complete the %s task." ), act_id.c_str(),
2910  _( "The required items are not available to complete the %s task." ), act_id.c_str() );
2911  }
2912  if( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_VEH_DECONST ||
2913  reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_VEH_REPAIR ) {
2914  you.activity_vehicle_part_index = -1;
2915  }
2916  return requirement_check_result::SKIP_LOCATION;
2917  } else {
2918  if( !check_only ) {
2919  if( you.as_npc() && you.as_npc()->job.fetch_history.count( what_we_need.str() ) != 0 &&
2920  you.as_npc()->job.fetch_history[what_we_need.str()] == calendar::turn ) {
2921  // this may be faild fetch already. give up task for a while to avoid infinite loop.
2922  you.activity = player_activity();
2923  you.backlog.clear();
2924  check_npc_revert( you );
2925  return requirement_check_result::SKIP_LOCATION;
2926  }
2927  you.backlog.emplace_front( act_id );
2928  you.assign_activity( ACT_FETCH_REQUIRED );
2929  player_activity &act_prev = you.backlog.front();
2930  act_prev.str_values.push_back( what_we_need.str() );
2931  act_prev.values.push_back( static_cast<int>( reason ) );
2932  // come back here after successfully fetching your stuff
2933  if( act_prev.coords.empty() ) {
2934  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> local_src_set;
2935  local_src_set.reserve( src_set.size() );
2936  for( const tripoint_abs_ms &elem : src_set ) {
2937  local_src_set.push_back( here.bub_from_abs( elem ) );
2938  }
2939  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> candidates;
2940  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &point_elem :
2941  here.points_in_radius( src_loc, /*radius=*/PICKUP_RANGE - 1, /*radiusz=*/0 ) ) {
2942  // we don't want to place the components where they could interfere with our ( or someone else's ) construction spots
2943  if( !you.sees( point_elem ) || ( std::find( local_src_set.begin(), local_src_set.end(),
2944  point_elem ) != local_src_set.end() ) || !here.can_put_items_ter_furn( point_elem ) ) {
2945  continue;
2946  }
2947  candidates.push_back( point_elem );
2948  }
2949  if( candidates.empty() ) {
2950  you.activity = player_activity();
2951  you.backlog.clear();
2952  check_npc_revert( you );
2953  return requirement_check_result::SKIP_LOCATION;
2954  }
2955  act_prev.coords.push_back(
2956  here.getabs(
2957  candidates[std::max( 0, static_cast<int>( candidates.size() / 2 ) )] )
2958  );
2959  }
2960  act_prev.placement = src;
2961  }
2962  return requirement_check_result::RETURN_EARLY;
2963  }
2964  }
2965  return requirement_check_result::SKIP_LOCATION;
2966 }
2967 
2968 /** Do activity at this location */
2969 /** Returns true if this multi activity may be processed further */
2970 static bool generic_multi_activity_do(
2971  Character &you, const activity_id &act_id, const activity_reason_info &act_info,
2972  const tripoint_abs_ms &src, const tripoint_bub_ms &src_loc )
2973 {
2974  // If any of the following activities return without processing
2975  // then they MUST return true here, to stop infinite loops.
2976  zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
2977 
2978  const do_activity_reason &reason = act_info.reason;
2979  const zone_data *zone =
2980  mgr.get_zone_at( src, get_zone_for_act( src_loc, mgr, act_id, _fac_id( you ) ), _fac_id( you ) );
2981  map &here = get_map();
2982  // something needs to be done, now we are there.
2983  // it was here earlier, in the space of one turn, maybe it got harvested by someone else.
2984  if( ( ( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_HARVESTING ) ||
2985  ( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CUT_HARVESTING ) ) &&
2986  here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GROWTH_HARVEST, src_loc ) ) {
2987  // TODO: fix point types
2988  iexamine::harvest_plant( you, src_loc.raw(), true );
2989  } else if( ( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_CLEARING ) &&
2990  here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_GROWTH_OVERGROWN, src_loc ) ) {
2991  iexamine::clear_overgrown( you, src_loc.raw() );
2992  } else if( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_TILLING &&
2993  here.has_flag( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_PLOWABLE, src_loc ) &&
2994  you.has_quality( qual_DIG, 1 ) && !here.has_furn( src_loc ) ) {
2995  you.assign_activity( churn_activity_actor( 18000, item_location() ) );
2996  you.backlog.emplace_front( act_id );
2997  you.activity.placement = src;
2998  return false;
2999  } else if( reason == do_activity_reason::NEEDS_PLANTING ) {

3152 
3153 bool generic_multi_activity_handler( player_activity &act, Character &you, bool check_only )
3154 {
3155  map &here = get_map();
3156  const tripoint_abs_ms abspos = here.getglobal( you.pos() );
3157  // NOLINTNEXTLINE(performance-unnecessary-copy-initialization)
3158  activity_id activity_to_restore = act.id();
3159  // Nuke the current activity, leaving the backlog alone
3160  if( !check_only ) {
3161  you.activity = player_activity();
3162  }
3163  // now we setup the target spots based on which activity is occurring
3164  // the set of target work spots - potentially after we have fetched required tools.
3165  std::unordered_set<tripoint_abs_ms> src_set =
3166  generic_multi_activity_locations( you, activity_to_restore );
3167  // now we have our final set of points
3168  std::vector<tripoint_abs_ms> src_sorted = get_sorted_tiles_by_distance( abspos, src_set );
3169  // now loop through the work-spot tiles and judge whether its worth traveling to it yet
3170  // or if we need to fetch something first.
3171 
3172  // check: if a fetch act was assigned but no need to do that anymore, restore our task
3173  // may cause infinite loop if something goes wrong
3174  // Maybe it makes more harm than good? I don't know.
3175  if( activity_to_restore == activity_id( ACT_FETCH_REQUIRED ) && src_sorted.empty() ) {
3176  // remind what you failed to fetch
3177  if( !check_only && !you.backlog.empty() ) {
3178  player_activity &act_prev = you.backlog.front();
3179  if( !act_prev.str_values.empty() && you.as_npc() ) {
3180  you.as_npc()->job.fetch_history[act_prev.str_values.back()] = calendar::turn;
3181  }
3182  }
3183  return true;
3184  }
3185  for( const tripoint_abs_ms &src : src_sorted ) {
3186  const tripoint_bub_ms &src_loc = here.bub_from_abs( src );
3187  if( !here.inbounds( src_loc ) && !check_only ) {
3188  if( !here.inbounds( you.pos() ) ) {
3189  // p is implicitly an NPC that has been moved off the map, so reset the activity
3190  // and unload them
3191  you.assign_activity( activity_to_restore );
3192  you.set_moves( 0 );
3193  g->reload_npcs();
3194  return false;
3195  }
3196  const std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> route = route_adjacent( you, src_loc );
3197  if( route.empty() ) {
3198  // can't get there, can't do anything, skip it
3199  continue;
3200  }
3201  you.set_moves( 0 );
3202  you.set_destination( route, player_activity( activity_to_restore ) );
3203  return false;
3204  }
3205  activity_reason_info act_info = can_do_activity_there( activity_to_restore, you,
3206  src_loc, ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE );
3207  // see activity_handlers.h enum for requirement_check_result
3208  const requirement_check_result req_res = generic_multi_activity_check_requirement(
3209  you, activity_to_restore, act_info, src, src_loc, src_set, check_only );
3210  if( req_res == requirement_check_result::SKIP_LOCATION ) {
3211  continue;
3212  } else if( req_res == requirement_check_result::RETURN_EARLY ) {
3213  return true;
3214  }
3215  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> route_workbench;
3216  if( activity_to_restore == ACT_MULTIPLE_CRAFT || activity_to_restore == ACT_MULTIPLE_DIS ) {
3217  // returns empty vector if we can't reach best tile
3218  // or we are already on the best tile
3219  route_workbench = route_best_workbench( you, src_loc );
3220  }
3221  // If we are doing disassemble we need to stand on the "best" tile
3222  if( square_dist( you.pos_bub(), src_loc ) > 1 || !route_workbench.empty() ) {
3223  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> route;
3224  // find best workbench if possible
3225  if( !route_workbench.empty() ) {
3226  route = route_workbench;
3227  } else {
3228  route = route_adjacent( you, src_loc );
3229  }
3230  // check if we found path to source / adjacent tile
3231  if( route.empty() ) {
3232  check_npc_revert( you );
3233  continue;
3234  }
3235  if( !check_only ) {
3236  if( you.get_moves() <= 0 ) {
3237  // Restart activity and break from cycle.
3238  you.assign_activity( activity_to_restore );
3239  return true;
3240  }
3241  // set the destination and restart activity after player arrives there
3242  // we don't need to check for safe mode,
3243  // activity will be restarted only if
3244  // player arrives on destination tile
3245  you.set_destination( route, player_activity( activity_to_restore ) );
3246  return true;
3247  }
3248  }
3249 
3250  // we checked if the work spot was in darkness earlier
3251  // but there is a niche case where the player is in darkness but the work spot is not
3252  // this can create infinite loops
3253  // and we can't check player.pos() for darkness before they've traveled to where they are going to be.
3254  // but now we are here, we check
3255  if( activity_to_restore != ACT_TIDY_UP &&
3256  activity_to_restore != ACT_MULTIPLE_MOP &&
3257  activity_to_restore != ACT_MOVE_LOOT &&
3258  activity_to_restore != ACT_FETCH_REQUIRED &&
3259  you.fine_detail_vision_mod( you.pos() ) > 4.0 ) {
3260  you.add_msg_if_player( m_info, _( "It is too dark to work here." ) );
3261  return false;
3262  }
3263  if( !check_only ) {
3264  if( !generic_multi_activity_do( you, activity_to_restore, act_info, src, src_loc ) ) {
3265  // if the activity was successful
3266  // then a new activity was assigned
3267  // and the backlog was given the multi-act
3268  return false;
3269  }
3270  } else {
3271  return true;
3272  }
3273  }
3274  if( !check_only ) {
3275  if( you.get_moves() <= 0 ) {
3276  // Restart activity and break from cycle.
3277  you.assign_activity( activity_to_restore );
3278  you.activity_vehicle_part_index = -1;
3279  return false;
3280  }
3281  // if we got here, we need to revert otherwise NPC will be stuck in AI Limbo and have a head explosion.
3282  if( you.backlog.empty() || src_set.empty() ) {
3283  check_npc_revert( you );
3284  if( player_activity( activity_to_restore ).is_multi_type() ) {
3285  you.assign_activity( activity_id::NULL_ID() );
3286  }
3287  }
3288  you.activity_vehicle_part_index = -1;
3289  }
3290  // scanned every location, tried every path.
3291  return false;
3292 }

3294 static std::optional<tripoint_bub_ms> find_best_fire( const std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> &from,
3295  const tripoint_bub_ms &center )
3296 {
3297  std::optional<tripoint_bub_ms> best_fire;
3298  time_duration best_fire_age = 1_days;
3299  map &here = get_map();
3300  for( const tripoint_bub_ms &pt : from ) {
3301  field_entry *fire = here.get_field( pt, fd_fire );
3302  if( fire == nullptr || fire->get_field_intensity() > 1 ||
3303  !here.clear_path( center, pt, PICKUP_RANGE, 1, 100 ) ) {
3304  continue;
3305  }
3306  time_duration fire_age = fire->get_field_age();
3307  // Refuel only the best fueled fire (if it needs it)
3308  if( fire_age < best_fire_age ) {
3309  best_fire = pt;
3310  best_fire_age = fire_age;
3311  }
3312  // If a contained fire exists, ignore any other fires
3313  if( here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FIRE_CONTAINER, pt ) ) {
3314  return pt;
3315  }
3316  }
3317 
3318  return best_fire;
3319 }

3325  return here.has_items( to ) &&
3326  here.accessible_items( to ) &&
3327  here.clear_path( from, to, PICKUP_RANGE, 1, 100 );

3330 static std::optional<tripoint_bub_ms> find_refuel_spot_zone( const tripoint_bub_ms &center,

3340  get_sorted_tiles_by_distance( center_abs, tiles_abs_unordered );

3352 static std::optional<tripoint_bub_ms> find_refuel_spot_trap(
3353  const std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> &from, const tripoint_bub_ms &center )
3354 {

3356  [center]( const tripoint_bub_ms & pt ) {
3357  // Hacky - firewood spot is a trap and it's ID-checked
3358  return get_map().tr_at( pt ).id == tr_firewood_source
3359  && has_clear_path_to_pickup_items( center, pt );
3360  } );
3361 
3362  if( tile != from.end() ) {
3363  return *tile;
3364  }
3365 
3366  return {};
3367 }

3369 // Visits an item and all its contents.
3370 static VisitResponse visit_item_contents( item_location &loc,
3371  const std::function<VisitResponse( item_location & )> &func )
3372 {
3373  switch( func( loc ) ) {
3374  case VisitResponse::ABORT:
3375  return VisitResponse::ABORT;
3376 
3377  case VisitResponse::NEXT:
3378  for( item_pocket *pocket : loc->get_all_contained_pockets() ) {
3379  for( item &i : pocket->edit_contents() ) {
3380  item_location child_loc( loc, &i );
3381  if( visit_item_contents( child_loc, func ) == VisitResponse::ABORT ) {
3382  return VisitResponse::ABORT;
3383  }
3384  }
3385  }
3386  /* intentional fallthrough */
3387 
3388  case VisitResponse::SKIP:
3389  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
3390  }
3391 
3392  /* never reached; suppress the warning */
3393  return VisitResponse::ABORT;
3394 }

3396 static int get_comestible_order( Character &you, const item_location &loc,
3397  const time_duration &time )
3398 {
3399  if( loc->rotten() ) {
3400  if( you.has_trait( trait_SAPROPHAGE ) || you.has_trait( trait_SAPROVORE ) ) {
3401  return 1;
3402  } else {
3403  return 5;
3404  }
3405  } else if( time == 0_turns ) {
3406  return 4;
3407  } else if( loc.has_parent() &&
3408  loc.parent_pocket()->spoil_multiplier() == 0.0f ) {
3409  return 3;
3410  } else {
3411  return 2;
3412  }
3413 }
3414 
3415 static time_duration get_comestible_time_left( const item_location &loc )
3416 {
3417  time_duration time_left = 0_turns;
3418  const time_duration shelf_life = loc->is_comestible() ? loc->get_comestible()->spoils :
3419  calendar::INDEFINITELY_LONG_DURATION;
3420  if( shelf_life > 0_turns ) {
3421  const item &it = *loc;
3422  const double relative_rot = it.get_relative_rot();
3423  time_left = shelf_life - shelf_life * relative_rot;
3424 
3425  // Correct for an estimate that exceeds shelf life -- this happens especially with
3426  // fresh items.
3427  if( time_left > shelf_life ) {
3428  time_left = shelf_life;
3429  }
3430  }
3431 
3432  return time_left;
3433 }
3434 
3435 static bool comestible_sort_compare( Character &you, const item_location &lhs,
3436  const item_location &rhs )
3437 {
3438  time_duration time_a = get_comestible_time_left( lhs );
3439  time_duration time_b = get_comestible_time_left( rhs );
3440  int order_a = get_comestible_order( you, lhs, time_a );
3441  int order_b = get_comestible_order( you, rhs, time_b );
3442 
3443  return order_a < order_b
3444  || ( order_a == order_b && time_a < time_b )
3445  || ( order_a == order_b && time_a == time_b );
3446 }
3447 
3448 int get_auto_consume_moves( Character &you, const bool food )
3449 {
3450  if( you.is_npc() ) {
3451  return 0;
3452  }
3453 
3454  const tripoint pos = you.pos();
3455  zone_manager &mgr = zone_manager::get_manager();
3456  zone_type_id consume_type_zone( "" );
3457  if( food ) {
3458  consume_type_zone = zone_type_AUTO_EAT;
3459  } else {
3460  consume_type_zone = zone_type_AUTO_DRINK;
3461  }
3462  map &here = get_map();
3463  const std::unordered_set<tripoint_abs_ms> &dest_set =
3464  mgr.get_near( consume_type_zone, here.getglobal( pos ), ACTIVITY_SEARCH_DISTANCE, nullptr,
3465  _fac_id( you ) );
3466  if( dest_set.empty() ) {
3467  return 0;
3468  }
3469  item_location best_comestible;
3470  for( const tripoint_abs_ms &loc : dest_set ) {
3471  if( loc.z() != you.pos().z ) {
3472  continue;
3473  }
3474 
3475  const auto visit = [&]( item_location & it ) {
3476  if( !you.can_consume_as_is( *it ) ) {
3477  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
3478  }
3479  if( it->has_flag( json_flag_NO_AUTO_CONSUME ) ) {
3480  // ignored due to NO_AUTO_CONSUME flag
3481  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
3482  }
3483  if( it->is_null() || it->is_craft() || !it->is_food() ||
3484  you.fun_for( *it ).first < -5 ) {
3485  // not good eatings.
3486  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
3487  }
3488  if( food && you.compute_effective_nutrients( *it ).kcal() < 50 ) {
3489  // not filling enough
3490  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
3491  }
3492  if( !you.will_eat( *it, false ).success() ) {
3493  // wont like it, cannibal meat etc
3494  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
3495  }
3496  if( !it->is_owned_by( you, true ) ) {
3497  // it aint ours.
3498  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
3499  }
3500  if( !food && it->get_comestible()->quench < 15 ) {
3501  // not quenching enough
3502  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
3503  }
3504  if( !food && it->is_watertight_container() && it->made_of( phase_id::SOLID ) ) {
3505  // it's frozen
3506  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
3507  }
3508  const use_function *usef = it->type->get_use( "BLECH_BECAUSE_UNCLEAN" );
3509  if( usef ) {
3510  // it's unclean
3511  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
3512  }
3513  if( it->get_comestible()->addictions.count( addiction_alcohol ) &&
3514  !you.has_addiction( addiction_alcohol ) ) {
3515  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
3516  }
3517 
3518  if( !best_comestible || comestible_sort_compare( you, it, best_comestible ) ) {
3519  best_comestible = it;
3520  }
3521 
3522  return VisitResponse::NEXT;
3523  };
3524 
3525  const optional_vpart_position vp = here.veh_at( here.getlocal( loc ) );
3526  if( vp ) {
3527  if( const std::optional<vpart_reference> vp_cargo = vp.cargo() ) {
3528  for( item &it : vp_cargo->items() ) {
3529  item_location i_loc( vehicle_cursor( vp->vehicle(), vp->part_index() ), &it );
3530  visit_item_contents( i_loc, visit );
3531  }
3532  }
3533  } else {
3534  for( item &it : here.i_at( here.getlocal( loc ) ) ) {
3535  item_location i_loc( map_cursor( here.getlocal( loc ) ), &it );
3536  visit_item_contents( i_loc, visit );
3537  }
3538  }
3539  }
3540 
3541  if( best_comestible ) {
3542  //The moves it takes you to walk there and back.
3543  int consume_moves = 2 * you.run_cost( 100, false ) * std::max( rl_dist( you.pos_bub(),
3544  best_comestible.pos_bub() ), 1 );
3545  consume_moves += to_moves<int>( you.get_consume_time( *best_comestible ) );
3546 
3547  you.consume( best_comestible );
3548  // eat() may have removed the item, so check its still there.
3549  if( best_comestible.get_item() && best_comestible->is_container() ) {
3550  best_comestible->on_contents_changed();
3551  }
3552 
3553  return consume_moves;
3554  }
3555  return 0;
3556 }
3557 
3558 // Try to add fuel to a fire. Return true if there is both fire and fuel; return false otherwise.
3559 bool try_fuel_fire( player_activity &act, Character &you, const bool starting_fire )
3560 {
3561  const tripoint_bub_ms pos = you.pos_bub();
3562  std::vector<tripoint_bub_ms> adjacent = closest_points_first( pos, PICKUP_RANGE );
3563  adjacent.erase( adjacent.begin() );
3564 
3565  map &here = get_map();
3566  std::optional<tripoint_bub_ms> best_fire =
3567  starting_fire ? here.bub_from_abs( act.placement ) : find_best_fire( adjacent, pos );
3568 
3569  if( !best_fire || !here.accessible_items( *best_fire ) ) {
3570  return false;
3571  }
3572 
3573  std::optional<tripoint_bub_ms> refuel_spot = find_refuel_spot_zone( pos, _fac_id( you ) );
3574  if( !refuel_spot ) {
3575  refuel_spot = find_refuel_spot_trap( adjacent, pos );
3576  if( !refuel_spot ) {
3577  return false;
3578  }
3579  }
3580 
3581  // Special case: fire containers allow burning logs, so use them as fuel if fire is contained
3582  bool contained = here.has_flag_furn( ter_furn_flag::TFLAG_FIRE_CONTAINER, *best_fire );
3583  fire_data fd( 1, contained );
3584  time_duration fire_age = here.get_field_age( *best_fire, fd_fire );
3585 
3586  // Maybe TODO: - refueling in the rain could use more fuel
3587  // First, simulate expected burn per turn, to see if we need more fuel
3588  map_stack fuel_on_fire = here.i_at( *best_fire );
3589  for( item &it : fuel_on_fire ) {
3590  it.simulate_burn( fd );
3591  // Unconstrained fires grow below -50_minutes age
3592  if( !contained && fire_age < -40_minutes && fd.fuel_produced > 1.0f &&
3593  !it.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
3594  // Too much - we don't want a firestorm!
3595  // Move item back to refueling pile
3596  // Note: move_item() handles messages (they're the generic "you drop x")
3597  move_item( you, it, 0, *best_fire, *refuel_spot, std::nullopt );
3598  return true;
3599  }
3600  }
3601 
3602  // Enough to sustain the fire
3603  // TODO: It's not enough in the rain
3604  if( !starting_fire && ( fd.fuel_produced >= 1.0f || fire_age < 10_minutes ) ) {
3605  return true;
3606  }
3607 
3608  // We need to move fuel from stash to fire
3609  map_stack potential_fuel = here.i_at( *refuel_spot );
3610  for( item &it : potential_fuel ) {
3611  if( it.made_of( phase_id::LIQUID ) ) {
3612  continue;
3613  }
3614 
3615  float last_fuel = fd.fuel_produced;
3616  it.simulate_burn( fd );
3617  if( fd.fuel_produced > last_fuel ) {
3618  int quantity = std::max( 1, std::min( it.charges, it.charges_per_volume( 250_ml ) ) );
3619  // Note: move_item() handles messages (they're the generic "you drop x")
3620  move_item( you, it, quantity, *refuel_spot, *best_fire, std::nullopt );
3621  return true;
3622  }
3623  }
3624  return true;
3625 }
